 100+ 93BB
 101+ 93BB              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 102+ 93BB 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 103+ 93BC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 104+ 93BE 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 105+ 93BF AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 106+ 93C0                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 106+ 93C0 FA EE 93    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
 107+ 93C3 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 108+ 93C4 B2                                   or      d
 109+ 93C5                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 109+ 93C5 FA CF 93    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
 110+ 93C8 B7                                   or      a
 111+ 93C9 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 112+ 93CB                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 112+ 93CB FA E2 93    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 113+ 93CE C9                                   ret
 114+ 93CF 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 115+ 93D0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 116+ 93D2 67                                   ld      h,a
 117+ 93D3 7A                                   ld      a,d
 118+ 93D4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 119+ 93D6 57                                   ld      d,a
 120+ 93D7 B7                                   or      a
 121+ 93D8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 122+ 93DA                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 122+ 93DA FA E2 93    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 123+ 93DD 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 124+ 93DE F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 125+ 93E0 67                                   ld      h,a
 126+ 93E1 C9                                   ret
 127+ 93E2              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
 127+ 93E2 AF          >                    xor a
 127+ 93E3 95          >                    sub l
 127+ 93E4 6F          >                    ld l,a
 127+ 93E5 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 127+ 93E6 94          >                    sub h
 127+ 93E7 67          >                    ld h,a
 128+ 93E8 78                                   ld      a,b
 129+ 93E9 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 130+ 93EB B4                                   or      h
 131+ 93EC 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 132+ 93ED C9                                   ret
 133+ 93EE B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
 134+ 93EF 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 135+ 93F0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 136+ 93F2 67                                   ld      h,a
 137+ 93F3 7A                                   ld      a,d
 138+ 93F4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 139+ 93F6 57                                   ld      d,a
 140+ 93F7 19                                   add     hl,de
 141+ 93F8 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 142+ 93F9 B4                                   or      h
 143+ 93FA 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 144+ 93FB C9                                   ret
 145+ 93FC
 146+ 93FC 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 147+ 93FD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 148+ 93FF 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 149+ 9400 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 150+ 9401                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 150+ 9401 FA 19 94    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 151+ 9404 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 152+ 9405 B2                                   or      d
 153+ 9406                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 153+ 9406 FA 0B 94    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 154+ 9409 19                                   add     hl,de
 155+ 940A C9                                   ret
 156+ 940B 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 157+ 940C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 158+ 940E 67                                   ld      h,a
 159+ 940F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 160+ 9410 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 9412 57                                   ld      d,a
 162+ 9413 19                                   add     hl,de
 163+ 9414 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 164+ 9416 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 165+ 9417 67                                   ld      h,a
 166+ 9418 C9                                   ret
 167+ 9419 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 168+ 941A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 169+ 941C 67                                   ld      h,a
 170+ 941D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 171+ 941E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 172+ 9420 57                                   ld      d,a
 173+ 9421 B7                                   or      a
 174+ 9422 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 175+ 9424 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 176+ 9426 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 177+ 9427 B4                                   or      h
 178+ 9428 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 179+ 9429 C9                                   ret
 180+ 942A              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 180+ 942A AF          >                    xor a
 180+ 942B 95          >                    sub l
 180+ 942C 6F          >                    ld l,a
 180+ 942D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 180+ 942E 94          >                    sub h
 180+ 942F 67          >                    ld h,a
 181+ 9430 78                                   ld      a,b
 182+ 9431 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 183+ 9433 B4                                   or      h
 184+ 9434 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 185+ 9435 C9                                   ret
 186+ 9436              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ 9436 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 188+ 9438 21 AC 9C                             ld      hl,varDust
 189+ 943B CD 37 93     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 190+ 943E 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 191+ 9440 C9                                   ret
 192+ 9441              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 193+ 9441 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 194+ 9443 21 AC 9C                             ld      hl,varDust
 195+ 9446 CD 75 93     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 196+ 9449 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 197+ 944B C9                                   ret
 198+ 944C              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 199+ 944C 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 200+ 944E FD 21 AC 9C                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 201+ 9452 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 202+ 9453 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 203+ 9456 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 204+ 9457 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 205+ 9459 3A 4E 9A                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 206+ 945C                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 206+ 945C FE 00       >                        cp	0
 206+ 945E C2 62 94    >                        jp	nz,.NormalSpeed
 207+ 9461 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 208+ 9462 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 209+ 9463 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 210+ 9465 CD 84 AD                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 211+ 9468                                      ShiftHLRight1
 211+ 9468 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 211+ 946A CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 212+ 946C                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 212+ 946C CB 3C       >			   srl h
 212+ 946E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 213+ 9470 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 214+ 9471 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 215+ 9473 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 216+ 9475 FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 216+ 9479 66 05
 217+ 947B ED 5B 4F 9A                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 218+ 947F CD BB 93                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 219+ 9482                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 219+ 9482 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 219+ 9484 C2 D9 95    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 220+ 9487 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 220+ 948B 74 05
 221+ 948D FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 221+ 9491 66 01
 222+ 9493 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 223+ 9494 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 224+ 9496 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 225+ 9497 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 226+ 9499 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 227+ 949B 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 228+ 949C E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 229+ 949E B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 230+ 949F 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 231+ 94A0 CD FC 93                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 232+ 94A3 7C                                   ld      a,h
 233+ 94A4 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 234+ 94A6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 234+ 94A6 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 234+ 94A8 D2 D9 95    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 235+ 94AB FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 235+ 94AF 74 01
 236+ 94B1 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 236+ 94B5 66 03
 237+ 94B7 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 238+ 94B8 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 239+ 94BA 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 240+ 94BB DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 241+ 94BD ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 242+ 94BF 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 243+ 94C0 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 244+ 94C2 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 245+ 94C3 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 246+ 94C4 CD FC 93                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 247+ 94C7 7C                                   ld      a,h
 248+ 94C8 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 249+ 94CA                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 249+ 94CA FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 249+ 94CC D2 D9 95    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 250+ 94CF 7C                                   ld      a,h
 251+ 94D0 E6 80                                and     $80
 252+ 94D2 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 253+ 94D4 7C                                   ld      a,h
 254+ 94D5                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 254+ 94D5 FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 254+ 94D7 D2 D9 95    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 255+ 94DA FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 255+ 94DE 74 03
 256+ 94E0              ; Now roll
 257+ 94E0              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 258+ 94E0 2A 69 99     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 259+ 94E3 7D                                   ld      a,l
 260+ 94E4 FE 00                                cp      0
 261+ 94E6 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 262+ 94E8                                      ;break
 263+ 94E8                                      ;ld      a,$80
 264+ 94E8                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 265+ 94E8 E5                                   push    hl
 266+ 94E9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 267+ 94EA E6 80                                and     $80
 268+ 94EC 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 269+ 94ED 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 270+ 94EE FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 271+ 94F1 5F                                   ld      e,a
 272+ 94F2 E6 80                                and     $80
 273+ 94F4 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 274+ 94F5 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 275+ 94F6 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 276+ 94F8 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 277+ 94F9 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 278+ 94FB 79                                   ld      a,c
 279+ 94FC A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 280+ 94FD B2                                   or      d
 281+ 94FE 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 282+ 94FF FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 282+ 9503 66 01
 283+ 9505 CD BB 93                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 284+ 9508 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 284+ 950C 74 01
 285+ 950E              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 286+ 950E              .YRoll:                 ;break
 287+ 950E E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 288+ 950F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 289+ 9510 E6 80                                and     $80
 290+ 9512 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 291+ 9513 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 292+ 9514 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 293+ 9517 5F                                   ld      e,a
 294+ 9518 E6 80                                and     $80
 295+ 951A 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 296+ 951B 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 297+ 951C E6 7F                                and     $7F
 298+ 951E 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 299+ 951F ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 300+ 9521 79                                   ld      a,c
 301+ 9522 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 302+ 9523 B2                                   or      d
 303+ 9524 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 304+ 9525 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 304+ 9529 66 03
 305+ 952B CD FC 93                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 306+ 952E FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 306+ 9532 74 03
 307+ 9534 3A 5C 99     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 308+ 9537 FE 00                                cp      0
 309+ 9539 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 310+ 953B              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 311+ 953B 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 312+ 953C FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 313+ 953F 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 314+ 9540 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 315+ 9542 5F                                   ld      e,a
 316+ 9543 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 317+ 9545                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 317+ 9545 CB 23       >			   sla e
 317+ 9547 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 318+ 9549 3A 5E 99                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 319+ 954C B2                                   or      d
 320+ 954D 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 321+ 954E FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 321+ 9552 66 03
 322+ 9554 CD FC 93                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 323+ 9557 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 323+ 955B 74 03
 324+ 955D              ; now work out screen pos
 325+ 955D              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 326+ 955D              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 327+ 955D              ;        pop     de
 328+ 955D               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 329+ 955D                                      ;pop     de
 330+ 955D              .NoPitch:
 331+ 955D FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 332+ 9560 6F                                   ld      l,a
 333+ 9561 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 334+ 9563                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 334+ 9563 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 334+ 9565 C2 6E 95    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 335+ 9568 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 336+ 956A 4F                                   ld      c,a
 337+ 956B C3 73 95                             jp      StarDoneX
 338+ 956E 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 339+ 956F 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 340+ 9571 90                                   sub     b
 341+ 9572 4F                                   ld      c,a
 342+ 9573 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 343+ 9576 6F                                   ld      l,a
 344+ 9577 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 345+ 9579                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 345+ 9579 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 345+ 957B C2 84 95    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 346+ 957E C6 60                                add     a,$60
 347+ 9580 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 9581 C3 89 95                             jp      StarDoneY
 349+ 9584 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 350+ 9585 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 351+ 9587 90                                   sub     b
 352+ 9588 47                                   ld      b,a
 353+ 9589 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 354+ 958B C5                                   push    bc
 355+ 958C              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 355+ 958C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 355+ 9590 CD 29 E1       call    l2_plot_pixel
 356+ 9593 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 357+ 9596 C1                                   pop    bc
 358+ 9597                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 358+ 9597 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 358+ 9599 D2 C9 95    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 359+ 959C 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 360+ 959E 0C                                   inc     c
 361+ 959F C5                                   push    bc
 362+ 95A0                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 362+ 95A0 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 363+ 95A4 CD 29 E1                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 364+ 95A7 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 365+ 95AA C1                                   pop    bc
 366+ 95AB                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 366+ 95AB FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 366+ 95AD D2 C9 95    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 367+ 95B0 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 368+ 95B2 04                                   inc     b
 369+ 95B3 C5                                   push    bc
 370+ 95B4                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 370+ 95B4 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 370+ 95B8 CD 29 E1         call    l2_plot_pixel
 371+ 95BB FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 372+ 95BE C1                                   pop    bc
 373+ 95BF 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 374+ 95C1 0D                                   dec     c
 375+ 95C2                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 375+ 95C2 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 375+ 95C6 CD 29 E1         call    l2_plot_pixel
 376+ 95C9 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 377+ 95CA FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 378+ 95CC E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 379+ 95CD ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 380+ 95D1 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 381+ 95D2 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 382+ 95D4 05                                   dec     b
 383+ 95D5 C2 52 94                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 384+ 95D8 C9                                   ret
 385+ 95D9 C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 386+ 95DA FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 387+ 95DC E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 388+ 95DD CD 37 93                             call    InitStarAtHL
 389+ 95E0 C3 CA 95                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 390+ 95E3              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 391+ 95E3 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 392+ 95E6 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 393+ 95E9 6F                                   ld      l,a
 394+ 95EA E6 7F                                and     $7F
 395+ 95EC 47                                   ld      b,a
 396+ 95ED CD 27 AD                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 397+ 95F0 7D                                   ld      a,l
 398+ 95F1                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 398+ 95F1 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 398+ 95F3 C2 FE 95    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 399+ 95F6              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 400+ 95F6 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 401+ 95F8 26 00                                ld          h,0
 402+ 95FA 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 403+ 95FB C3 05 96                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 404+ 95FE              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 405+ 95FE 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 406+ 9600 26 00                                ld          h,0
 407+ 9602                                      ClearCarryFlag
 407+ 9602 B7          >                        or a
 408+ 9603 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 409+ 9605              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 410+ 9605 7D                                   ld          a,l
 411+ 9606 32 04 9D                             ld          (varStarX),a
 412+ 9609 C9                                   ret
 413+ 960A
 414+ 960A FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 415+ 960D FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 416+ 9610 6F                                   ld          l,a
 417+ 9611 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 418+ 9613 47                                   ld          b,a
 419+ 9614 CD 27 AD                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 420+ 9617 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 421+ 9618                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 421+ 9618 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 421+ 961A C2 25 96    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 422+ 961D                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 423+ 961D 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 424+ 961F                                      ClearCarryFlag
 424+ 961F B7          >                        or a
 425+ 9620 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 426+ 9622 C3 2A 96                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 427+ 9625              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 428+ 9625 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 429+ 9627 26 00                                ld          h,0
 430+ 9629 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 431+ 962A              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 432+ 962A 7D                                   ld          a,l
 433+ 962B 32 05 9D                             ld          (varStarY),a
 434+ 962E C9                                   ret
 435+ 962F
 436+ 962F

   1+ 962F
   2+ 962F 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 9630 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 9634 7D
   4+ 9635 2F 96        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 9637 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 9639 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 963C 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 963E 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 9642              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 9642
  11+ 9642              memfill_dma:
  12+ 9642              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 9642              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 9642 32 2F 96     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 9645              .set_target:
  16+ 9645 22 3C 96     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 9648              .set_length:
  18+ 9648 ED 53 37 96  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 964C              .write_dma:
  20+ 964C 21 30 96     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 964F 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 9651 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 9653 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 9655 C9           	ret
  25+ 9656
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
1138  9656                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 9656
   2+ 9656 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 965A 7D
   3+ 965B 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 965D 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 965F 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 9662 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 9664 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 9668              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 9668
  10+ 9668              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 9668              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 9668              .set_target:
  13+ 9668 22 62 96     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 966B              .set_source:
  15+ 966B ED 53 5B 96  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 966F              .set_length:
  17+ 966F ED 43 5D 96  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 9673              .write_dma:
  19+ 9673 21 56 96     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 9676 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 9678 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 967A ED B3        	otir
  23+ 967C C9           	ret
  24+ 967D
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm

 182+ 968C 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40          ; This is the list of key states for all the VK keys presssed i.e. VK_CAPS through to VK_B
 183+ 96B4              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 184+ 96B4 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 185+ 96BC FE FD FB F7  KeyAddrTab				DB	$FE, $FD, $FB, $F7, $EF, $DF, $BF, $7F
 185+ 96C0 EF DF BF 7F
 186+ 96C4              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 187+ 96C4              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 188+ 96C4              ; key list sequence is in table above
 189+ 96C4 9B 96 9C 96  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 189+ 96C8 9D 96 9E 96
 189+ 96CC A6 96
 190+ 96CE A5 96 96 96                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 190+ 96D2 91 96 97 96
 190+ 96D6 92 96
 191+ 96D8 AF 96 9A 96                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 191+ 96DC 94 96 99 96
 191+ 96E0 98 96
 192+ 96E2 A8 96 8C 96                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 192+ 96E6 B2 96 AE 96
 192+ 96EA AD 96
 193+ 96EC 95 96 AB 96                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip

 208+ 9740              ; mapping of a code to the lookup table Keyboard map. So if you are using an addr_Pressed you can then fetch from KeyboardMap the address in Keys
 209+ 9740              ; for the raw key press status
 210+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 211+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 212+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 213+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 214+ 9740              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 215+ 9740              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 216+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 217+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 218+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate

 222+ 9740              addr_Pressed_FireMissile   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireMissile
 223+ 9740              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile

 231+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 232+ 9740              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 233+ 9740              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 234+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 235+ 9740              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 236+ 9740              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 237+ 9740              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 238+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 239+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 240+ 9740              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 241+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 242+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 243+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume
 244+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Recentre      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Recentre
 245+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit

 247+ 9740              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp
 248+ 9740              addr_Pressed_CursorDown    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorDown
 249+ 9740              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 250+ 9740
 251+ 9740
 252+ 9740              MIsKeyPressed:          MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 253+ 9740 ~                                    ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 254+ 9740 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 255+ 9740 ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero   misstarget
 256+ 9740                                      ENDM
 257+ 9740
 258+ 9740 21 8C 96     init_keyboard:          ld		hl,Keys                         ; no key s are pressed by default
 259+ 9743 11 28 00                             ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen               ;
 260+ 9746 3E 00                                ld		a,0                             ;
 261+ 9748 CD 42 96                             call	memfill_dma                     ;
 262+ 974B C9                                   ret                                     ;
 263+ 974C
 264+ 974C
 265+ 974C
 266+ 974C DD 21 B4 96  scan_keyboard:          ld		ix,RawKeys                      ; hl = table of raw IO port readings
 267+ 9750 21 BC 96                             ld		hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 268+ 9753 0E 08                                ld		c,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 269+ 9755 11 8C 96                             ld      de,Keys                         ; ix = table of key states from raw read
 270+ 9758 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 271+ 9759 DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 272+ 975B DD 77 00                             ld      (ix+0),a                        ; save raw scan
 273+ 975E DD 23                                inc     ix
 274+ 9760 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 275+ 9761 06 05        .ProcessInputBits:      ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 276+ 9763 1F           .ProcessBitsLoop:       rra                                     ; shit bit 0 into carry
 277+ 9764 CB 47                                bit		0,a								; is bit set
 278+ 9766 30 08                                jr      nc,.SetKeyPressed               ; low bit means it was pressed
 279+ 9768 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 280+ 976A                                      ZeroA
 280+ 976A AF          >                        xor a
 281+ 976B C3 78 97                             jp      .SetKey
 282+ 976E 20 0B                                jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 283+ 9770 FD 6F        .SetKeyPressed:	        ld      iyl,a                           ; save current input byte
 284+ 9772 1A                                   ld      a,(de)                          ; get current keystate
 285+ 9773 FE 02                                cp      2
 286+ 9775 28 02                                jr      z,.AlreadyHeld
 287+ 9777 3C                                   inc     a                               ; and increment by 1 as its moved from previous state
 288+ 9778 12           .SetKey:                ld		(de),a				  	        ; save key Pressed state
 289+ 9779 FD 7D        .AlreadyHeld:           ld      a,iyl                           ; and retrieve the current input byte
 290+ 977B 13           .SkipKeySet:	        inc		de								; move to next key
 291+ 977C 10 E5                                djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 292+ 977E 0D                                   dec     c                               ; thats one row of bits all processed
 293+ 977F 20 D7                                jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 294+ 9781 C9                                   ret
 295+ 9782
 296+ 9782
 297+ 9782
 298+ 9782              GetKeyStateAddressDE:   MACRO
 299+ 9782 ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 300+ 9782 ~                                    add     hl,a
 301+ 9782 ~                                    ld      e,(hl)
 302+ 9782 ~                                    inc     hl
 303+ 9782 ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                          ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 9782                                      ENDM
 305+ 9782
 306+ 9782              GetKeyStateAddressHL:   MACRO
 307+ 9782 ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 308+ 9782 ~                                    add     hl,a
 309+ 9782 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 310+ 9782 ~                                    inc     hl
 311+ 9782 ~                                    ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 312+ 9782 ~                                    ld      l,a
 313+ 9782                                      ENDM
 314+ 9782
 315+ 9782
 316+ 9782              ;;old debug codeCurrentX            DB 0
 317+ 9782              ;;old debug codeCurrentY            DB 0
 318+ 9782              ;;old debug code
 319+ 9782              ;;old debug codedisplayKeyStatus:       xor         a
 320+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 321+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          hl,RawKeys
 322+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(hl)
 323+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        and         %00011111
 324+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          b,5
 325+ 9782              ;;old debug code.displayLoop:           push        bc,,hl
 326+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        rra
 327+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        jr          c,.displayNoPress
 328+ 9782              ;;old debug code.displayPress:          push        af
 329+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 330+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 331+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 332+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 333+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'*'
 334+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 335+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 336+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 337+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 338+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 339+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 340+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 341+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 342+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ret
 343+ 9782              ;;old debug code.displayNoPress:        push        af
 344+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 345+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 346+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 347+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 348+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'O'
 349+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 350+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 351+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 352+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 353+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 354+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 355+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 356+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 357+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ret
 358+ 9782              ;;old debug code
 359+ 9782              ;;old debug codedisplayDownStatus:      ld  a,(Keys+      KeyCode_CursorUp)
 360+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        cp  0
 361+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayNoUp
 362+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        cp  1
 363+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayUp
 364+ 9782              ;;old debug code.displayHeld:           ld      de,8*15
 365+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"*"
 366+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 367+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 368+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ret
 369+ 9782              ;;old debug code.displayUp:             ld      de,8*15
 370+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"+"
 371+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 372+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 373+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ret
 374+ 9782              ;;old debug code.displayNoUp:             ld      de,8*15
 375+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"O"
 376+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 377+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 378+ 9782              ;;old debug code                        ret
 379+ 9782              ;;old debug code
 380+ 9782
 381+ 9782
 382+ 9782              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan, waits until key gets to state 1, if it was already held then#
 383+ 9782              ; it will have to be let go to reset of 0 and scan again
 384+ 9782              ; Deprecated as not used as yet
 385+ 9782              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_press:   GetKeyStateAddressHL
 386+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 387+ 9782              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 388+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 389+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 390+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 391+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfANENusng  1,.wait_loop             ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 392+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 393+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        ret
 394+ 9782              ;;;;;;; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan waits until key gets to state 2
 395+ 9782              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_held:    GetKeyStateAddressDE
 396+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 397+ 9782              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 398+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 399+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 400+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 401+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  2, .wait_loop
 402+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 403+ 9782              ;;;;;;                        ret
 404+ 9782
 405+ 9782              ; Gets the current keystate of the c_Pressed Key in a register
 406+ 9782              get_key_a_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 406+ 9782 21 C4 96    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 406+ 9785 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 406+ 9787 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 406+ 9788 23          >                        inc     hl
 406+ 9789 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 406+ 978A 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 407+ 978B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 408+ 978C C9                                   ret
 409+ 978D
 410+ 978D              ; sets they keystate of c pressed key in a register to 1 (pressed)
 411+ 978D              force_key_press:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; read key locations
 411+ 978D 21 C4 96    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 411+ 9790 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 411+ 9792 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 411+ 9793 23          >                        inc     hl
 411+ 9794 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 411+ 9795 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 412+ 9796 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 413+ 9798 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 414+ 9799 C9                                   ret
 415+ 979A
 416+ 979A              is_key_up_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL
 416+ 979A 21 C4 96    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 416+ 979D ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 416+ 979F 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 416+ 97A0 23          >                        inc     hl
 416+ 97A1 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 416+ 97A2 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 417+ 97A3 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 418+ 97A4 FE 00                                cp      0
 419+ 97A6 C9                                   ret
 420+ 97A7
 421+ 97A7              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 422+ 97A7              is_key_pressed:         GetKeyStateAddressHL
 422+ 97A7 21 C4 96    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 422+ 97AA ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 422+ 97AC 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 422+ 97AD 23          >                        inc     hl
 422+ 97AE 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 422+ 97AF 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 423+ 97B0 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 424+ 97B1 FE 01                                cp      1                               ; we cant just test bit 0 as this may have been held long
 425+ 97B3 C9                                   ret
 426+ 97B4
 427+ 97B4              ; returns nz is set if c_ key is held, if key was held then keystate would be 2 or 3, i.e. bit 1 set
 428+ 97B4              is_key_held:            GetKeyStateAddressHL
 428+ 97B4 21 C4 96    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 428+ 97B7 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 428+ 97B9 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 428+ 97BA 23          >                        inc     hl
 428+ 97BB 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 428+ 97BC 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 429+ 97BD 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 430+ 97BE E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 431+ 97C0 C9                                   ret
 432+ 97C1
 433+ 97C1              ; checks to see if any key is pressed in the key table
 434+ 97C1 21 8C 96     is_any_key_pressed:     ld      hl,Keys
 435+ 97C4 01 28 00                             ld      bc,40
 436+ 97C7 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 437+ 97C9 ED B1                                cpir                                    ; search for the value 1
 438+ 97CB 28 03                                jr      z,.KeyPressed                   ; if a key was pressed then handle press
 439+ 97CD                                      SetAFalse
 439+ 97CD 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 440+ 97CF C9                                   ret
 441+ 97D0 3E 27        .KeyPressed:            ld      a,39                            ; so c will be how many keys still to scan
 442+ 97D2 91                                   sub     c                               ; so a = 40 - c to get to result
 443+ 97D3 C9                                   ret
 444+ 97D4
 445+ 97D4 21 8C 96     is_any_key_held:        ld      hl,Keys
 446+ 97D7 06 28                                ld      b,40
 447+ 97D9 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 448+ 97DB 7E           .KeyReadLoop:           ld      a,(hl)
 449+ 97DC E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 450+ 97DE C2 E8 97                             jp      nz,.KeyPressed
 451+ 97E1 23                                   inc     hl
 452+ 97E2 0C                                   inc     c
 453+ 97E3 10 F6                                djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 454+ 97E5                                      SetAFalse
 454+ 97E5 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 455+ 97E7 C9                                   ret
 456+ 97E8 79           .KeyPressed:            ld      a,c
 457+ 97E9 C9                                   ret
 458+ 97EA
 459+ 97EA
 460+ 97EA 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 461+ 9808 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 462+ 9809 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 463+ 980A 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 464+ 980B 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 465+ 980C              InputLimit              EQU 20
 466+ 980C
 467+ 980C 21 EA 97     keyboard_copy_input_to_de:  ld      hl,InputString
 468+ 980F 3A 09 98                                 ld      a,(InputCursor)
 469+ 9812 FE 00                                    cp      0
 470+ 9814 28 05                                    jr      z,.NoString
 471+ 9816 4F                                       ld      c,a
 472+ 9817 06 00                                    ld      b,0
 473+ 9819 ED B0                                    ldir
 474+ 981B 3E 00        .NoString                   ld      a,0
 475+ 981D 12                                       ld      (de),a
 476+ 981E C9                                       ret
 477+ 981F
 478+ 981F AF           initInputText:          xor     a
 479+ 9820 32 09 98                             ld      (InputCursor),a
 480+ 9823                                      SetMemFalse EnterPressed
 480+ 9823 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 480+ 9825 32 0A 98    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 481+ 9828                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 481+ 9828 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 481+ 982A 32 0B 98    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 482+ 982D 21 EA 97                             ld      hl,InputString
 483+ 9830 06 1E                                ld      b,30
 484+ 9832 77           .wipeloop:              ld      (hl),a
 485+ 9833 23                                   inc     hl
 486+ 9834 10 FC                                djnz    .wipeloop
 487+ 9836 C9                                   ret
 488+ 9837
 489+ 9837              InputName:              SetMemFalse InputChanged
 489+ 9837 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 489+ 9839 32 0B 98    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 490+ 983C CD C1 97                             call    is_any_key_pressed
 491+ 983F FE FF                                cp      $FF
 492+ 9841 C8                                   ret     z
 493+ 9842 4F           .KeyPressed:            ld      c,a
 494+ 9843 3A 09 98                             ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 495+ 9846 FE 14                                cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 496+ 9848 28 0B                                jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 497+ 984A 21 18 97                             ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 498+ 984D 79                                   ld      a,c
 499+ 984E ED 31                                add     hl,a
 500+ 9850 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 501+ 9851 FE 41                                cp      "A"
 502+ 9853 30 0B                                jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 503+ 9855              ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 504+ 9855 FE 20        .DeleteOrEnterOnly      cp      " "                             ; if space was  pressed (mapped to Hash in ASCII table))
 505+ 9857 28 33                                jr      z,.SpacePressed               ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 506+ 9859 FE 3E                                cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 507+ 985B 28 19                                jr      z,.EnterPressed
 508+ 985D FE 23                                cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 509+ 985F C9                                   ret
 510+ 9860 47           .AlphaPressed:          ld      b,a
 511+ 9861 3A 09 98                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 512+ 9864 4F                                   ld      c,a
 513+ 9865 21 EA 97                             ld      hl,InputString
 514+ 9868 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 515+ 986A 78                                   ld      a,b
 516+ 986B 70                                   ld      (hl),b
 517+ 986C 79                                   ld      a,c
 518+ 986D 21 09 98                             ld      hl,InputCursor
 519+ 9870 34                                   inc     (hl)
 520+ 9871                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 520+ 9871 AF          >                        xor     a
 520+ 9872 32 0B 98    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 521+ 9875 C9                                   ret
 522+ 9876 3A 09 98     .EnterPressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 523+ 9879 21 EA 97                             ld      hl,InputString
 524+ 987C ED 31                                add     hl,a
 525+ 987E                                      ZeroA
 525+ 987E AF          >                        xor a
 526+ 987F 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 527+ 9880                                      SetMemTrue EnterPressed
 527+ 9880 AF          >                        xor     a
 527+ 9881 32 0A 98    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 528+ 9884                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 528+ 9884 AF          >                        xor     a
 528+ 9885 32 0B 98    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 529+ 9888 CD 40 97                             call    init_keyboard           ; Flush keyboard status so futher inputs don't auto read the enter key as a second press
 530+ 988B C9                                   ret
 531+ 988C 3A 09 98     .SpacePressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)         ; Space = delete
 532+ 988F FE 00                                cp      0                       ; if input is zero length then can not delete
 533+ 9891 C8                                   ret     z
 534+ 9892 3D                                   dec     a                       ; move back one and update cursor pos
 535+ 9893 32 09 98                             ld      (InputCursor),a         ;
 536+ 9896 21 EA 97                             ld      hl,InputString          ; now update end of line to null
 537+ 9899 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 538+ 989B                                      ZeroA                           ; .
 538+ 989B AF          >                        xor a
 539+ 989C 77                                   ld      (hl),a                  ; .
 540+ 989D                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 540+ 989D AF          >                        xor     a
 540+ 989E 32 0B 98    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 541+ 98A1 C9                                   ret
 542+ 98A2
 543+ 98A2 AF           MovementKeyTest:        xor     a
 544+ 98A3 32 3E 9B                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 545+ 98A6 3A 5D 9A                             ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 546+ 98A9 E6 FC                                and     $FC
 547+ 98AB 20 26                                jr      nz,CursorKeys
 548+ 98AD 2A D2 96     ClimbDiveKeys:          ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 549+ 98B0 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 550+ 98B1                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanDiveKey

 550+ 98B2 CA C0 98    >                        jp	z, ScanDiveKey

 557+ 98C4 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags

 559+ 98CB F6 40                                or      $40

 561+ 98D0 C3 F6 98                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 562+ 98D3 2A 0E 97     CursorKeys:             ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)

 564+ 98D7                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanCursorDownKey
 564+ 98D7 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 564+ 98D8 CA E6 98    >                        jp	z, ScanCursorDownKey
 565+ 98DB 3A 3E 9B                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 566+ 98DE F6 80                                or      $80

 570+ 98E9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 571+ 98EA                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 571+ 98EA A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 571+ 98EB CA F6 98    >                        jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 572+ 98EE 3A 3E 9B                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 573+ 98F1 F6 40                                or      $40

 577+ 98FA A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 577+ 98FB CA 07 99    >                        jp	z, ScanRightKey

 130+ 9938              ;;;;			\ NEWB examples

 333+ 9B69              ;UniverseTable			DS	26				; 1741  \ address pointers for 13 ships INF on pages &9. 37 bytes each.
 334+ 9B69              ; $0900 =	EQUW page9+37* 0 \ copied to inner worskpace INWK on zero-page when needed
 335+ 9B69              ; $0925 =	EQUW page9+37* 1
 336+ 9B69              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2
 337+ 9B69              ; $096F =	EQUW page9+37* 3
 338+ 9B69              ; $0994 =	EQUW page9+37* 4
 339+ 9B69              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 340+ 9B69              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 341+ 9B69              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 342+ 9B69              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 343+ 9B69              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 344+ 9B69              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 345+ 9B69              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
 346+ 9B69              ; $0ABC =	EQUW page9+37*12 \ allwk up to &0ABC while heap for edges working down from &CFF.

  95+ 9F03 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  96+ 9F04 C9                                   ret
  97+ 9F05
  98+ 9F05 21 24 9B     IsPlanetOrSpaceStation: ld      hl,UniverseSlotList+1
  99+ 9F08 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 100+ 9F09 C9                                   ret
 101+ 9F0A
 102+ 9F0A 21 23 9B     FindNextFreeSlotInC:    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 103+ 9F0D 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize
 104+ 9F0F 0E 00                                ld      c, 0
 105+ 9F11 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
 106+ 9F12                                      JumpIfAEqNusng $FF, .FoundSlot
 106+ 9F12 FE FF       >                        cp     $FF
 106+ 9F14 CA 1D 9F    >                        jp      z,.FoundSlot
 107+ 9F17 0C                                   inc     c
 108+ 9F18 23                                   inc     hl
 109+ 9F19 10 F6                                djnz    .SearchLoop
 110+ 9F1B                                      SetCarryFlag
 110+ 9F1B 37          >                        scf
 111+ 9F1C C9                                   ret
 112+ 9F1D              .FoundSlot:             ClearCarryFlag
 112+ 9F1D B7          >                        or a
 113+ 9F1E C9                                   ret
 114+ 9F1F
 115+ 9F1F CD 0A 9F     FindNextFreeSlotInA:    call    FindNextFreeSlotInC
 116+ 9F22 79                                   ld      a,c
 117+ 9F23 C9                                   ret
 118+ 9F24
# file closed: ./Variables/UniverseSlotRoutines.asm

1157  9F62                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 9F62              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 9F62              doRND2:
   3+ 9F62 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 9F63              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 9F63              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ 9F63 3A 48 99     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ 9F66 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ 9F68 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ 9F69 21 4A 99     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ 9F6C 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ 9F6D 32 48 99     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ 9F70 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ 9F71 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ 9F72 32 4A 99                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ 9F75 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ 9F76 3A 49 99                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ 9F79 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ 9F7A 21 4B 99     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ 9F7D 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ 9F7E 32 49 99                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ 9F81 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ 9F82 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ 9F83 32 4B 99                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ 9F86 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ 9F87 C9                                   ret
  26+ 9F88
  27+ 9F88              fillHeapRandom4Points:                      ; counter Y, 4 rnd bytes to edge heap
  28+ 9F88 06 04        	ld		b,4
  29+ 9F8A 21 0E C2     	ld		hl,UbnkLineArray				; line data
  30+ 9F8D              FillRandom:                                 ; Writes random bytes hl = start address, b = nbr bytes to fill
  31+ 9F8D              EE55:
  32+ 9F8D CD 63 9F     	call	doRND							; get random
  33+ 9F90 77           	ld		(hl),a							; (XX19),Y
  34+ 9F91 23           	inc		hl
  35+ 9F92 10 F9        	djnz	FillRandom						; 3to6 = random bytes for seed
  36+ 9F94 C9               ret
  37+ 9F95
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm
