   1+ 9F95 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 9F99 58 59 53 45
   1+ 9F9D 45 44
   2+ 9F9F 21 54 9B     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 9FA2 11 3E 9A                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 9FA5 ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 9FA7 ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 9FA9 ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 9FAB ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 9FAD ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 9FAF ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 9FB1 C9                                   ret
  11+ 9FB2
  12+ 9FB2 21 3E 9A     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 9FB5 11 54 9B                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 9FB8 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 9FBA
  16+ 9FBA 21 54 9B     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 9FBD 11 48 9B                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 9FC0 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 9FC2
  20+ 9FC2 21 48 9B     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 9FC5 11 54 9B                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 9FC8 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 9FCA
  24+ 9FCA 21 48 9B     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 9FCD 11 3E 9A                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 9FD0 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 9FD2
  28+ 9FD2 21 3E 9A     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 9FD5 11 48 9B                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 9FD8 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 9FDA
  32+ 9FDA              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 9FDA CD DD 9F     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 9FDD              .NextStep:
  35+ 9FDD CD E0 9F     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 9FE0              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 9FE0 3A 3E 9A     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 9FE3 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 9FE4 21 40 9A     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 9FE7 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 9FE8 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 9FE9 3A 3F 9A     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 9FEC 21 41 9A     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 9FEF 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 9FF0 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 9FF1 3A 40 9A     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 9FF4 32 3E 9A     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 9FF7 3A 41 9A     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 9FFA 32 3F 9A     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 9FFD 3A 43 9A     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ A000 32 41 9A     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ A003 3A 42 9A     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ A006 32 40 9A     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ A009 B7           		or		a
  55+ A00A 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ A00B 21 40 9A     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ A00E 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ A00F 32 42 9A     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ A012 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ A013 21 41 9A     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ A016 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ A017 32 43 9A     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ A01A C9           		ret
  64+ A01B
  65+ A01B              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ A01B CD 1E A0     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ A01E              .NextStep:
  68+ A01E CD 21 A0     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ A021              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ A021              ; x = a + c
  71+ A021 3A 48 9B     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ A024 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ A025 21 4A 9B     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ A028 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ A029 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ A02A              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ A02A 3A 49 9B     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ A02D 21 4B 9B     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ A030 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ A031 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ A032 3A 4A 9B     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ A035 32 48 9B     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ A038 3A 4B 9B     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ A03B 32 49 9B     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ A03E 3A 4D 9B     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ A041 32 4B 9B     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ A044 3A 4C 9B     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ A047 32 4A 9B     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ A04A B7           		or		a
  90+ A04B 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ A04C 21 4A 9B     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ A04F 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ A050 32 4C 9B     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ A053 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ A054 21 4B 9B     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ A057 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ A058 32 4D 9B     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ A05B C9           		ret
  99+ A05C
 100+ A05C 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ A05D 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ A05E 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ A05F
 104+ A05F AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ A060 32 57 9A                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ A063 3A 3F 9A     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ A066 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ A067 3A 5B 9B     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ A06A 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ A06B 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ A06C 90                                   sub		b
 112+ A06D CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ A06F 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ A071 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ A073 32 5E A0     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ A076 ED 5B 5C A0                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ A07A BA                                   cp		d
 118+ A07B 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ A07D 3A 41 9A     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ A080 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ A081 3A 5A 9B                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ A084 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ A085 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ A086 90                                   sub		b
 125+ A087 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ A089 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ A08B ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ A08D 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ A08E BB                                   cp		e
 130+ A08F 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ A091 3A 5E A0     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ A094 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ A095 ED 43 5C A0                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ A099 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ A09A CD D2 9F                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ A09D C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ A09E 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ A09F B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ A0A0 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ A0A1 CD DA 9F     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ A0A4 3A 57 9A                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ A0A7 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ A0A8 FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ A0AA C8                                   ret		z
 145+ A0AB 32 57 9A                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ A0AE 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ A0B0
 148+ A0B0              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ A0B0 3A 49 9B     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ A0B3 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ A0B5 32 DC 9A     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ A0B8 3A 4A 9B     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ A0BB CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ A0BD CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ A0BF CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ A0C1 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ A0C3 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ A0C5 32 DD 9A     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ A0C8 CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ A0CA FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ A0CC 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ A0CE              .Fedual:
 163+ A0CE 3A DC 9A     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ A0D1 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ A0D3 32 DC 9A     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ A0D6              .CanBeRich:
 167+ A0D6 3A DC 9A     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ A0D9 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ A0DB 32 DE 9A     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ A0DE 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ A0DF 3A 4B 9B     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ A0E2 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ A0E4 80           		add		a,b
 174+ A0E5 32 DE 9A     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ A0E8 3A DD 9A     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ A0EB CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ A0ED 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ A0EE 3A DE 9A     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ A0F1 80           		add		a,b
 180+ A0F2 32 DE 9A     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ A0F5 CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ A0F7 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ A0F9 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ A0FA 3A DC 9A     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ A0FD 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ A0FE 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ A0FF 3A DD 9A     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ A102 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ A103 32 DF 9A     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ A106 3A DC 9A     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ A109 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ A10B C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ A10D 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ A10E 3A DD 9A     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ A111 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ A113 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ A114 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ A116 3A DF 9A     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ A119 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ A11A ED 30        		mul
 201+ A11C CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ A11E CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ A120 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ A122 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ A124 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ A126 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ A128 ED 53 E1 9A  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ A12C              .DoRadius:
 209+ A12C 3A 4B 9B     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ A12F 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ A130 3A 4D 9B     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ A133 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ A135 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ A137 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ A138 ED 43 E5 9A  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ A13C C9           		ret
 217+ A13D
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  37+ A283
  38+ A283              getTableText:
  39+ A283              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ A283              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ A283 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ A284 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ A286 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ A288 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ A289 23           	inc		hl
  46+ A28A 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ A28B EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ A28C D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ A28D C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ A28E
  51+ A28E
  52+ A28E              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ A28E              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ A28E              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ A28E              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ A28E              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ A28E              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ A28E              getRankIndex:
  59+ A28E              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ A28E              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ A28E 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ A28F B3           	or		e
  63+ A290 FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ A292 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ A293 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ A294 21 E2 A1     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ A297              .testLoop:
  68+ A297 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ A298 23           	inc		hl
  70+ A299 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ A29A E5           	push	hl
  72+ A29B 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ A29C 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ A29D CD C8 AE     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ A2A0 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ A2A2              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ A2A2 E1           	pop		hl
  78+ A2A3 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ A2A4 23           	inc		hl
  80+ A2A5 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ A2A6 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ A2A8              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ A2A8 E1           	pop		hl
  84+ A2A9 C9           	ret
  85+ A2AA
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

# file opened: ./Tables/dictionary.asm

 181+ A72B              CapitaliseString:
 182+ A72B              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ A72B              .CapLoop:
 184+ A72B 23           	inc		hl
 185+ A72C 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ A72D FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ A72F C8           	ret		z
 188+ A730 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ A732 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ A734 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ A736 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ A738              .LowerCase:
 193+ A738 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ A73A 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ A73B 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ A73D
 197+ A73D              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ A73D 21 AE A5     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ A740 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ A742 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ A744 D5           	push	de
 202+ A745 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ A746 23           	inc		hl
 204+ A747 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ A748 EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ A749 D1           	pop		de
 207+ A74A C9           	ret
 208+ A74B
 209+ A74B
 210+ A74B              expandTokenToString:
 211+ A74B              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ A74B 21 D4 A6     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ A74E CD 83 A2     	call	getTableText
 214+ A751 11 0A A7     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ A754              .ReadLoop:
 216+ A754 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ A755 FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ A757 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ A759 E5           	push	hl
 220+ A75A D5           	push	de
 221+ A75B 21 AE A5     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ A75E CD 83 A2     	call	getTableText
 223+ A761 D1           	pop		de
 224+ A762              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ A762 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ A763 FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ A765 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ A767              ;.GetChar:
 229+ A767 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ A768 13           	inc		de
 231+ A769 23           	inc		hl
 232+ A76A 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ A76C              .AddSpace:
 234+ A76C 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ A76E 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ A76F 13           	inc		de
 237+ A770 E1           	pop		hl
 238+ A771 23           	inc		hl
 239+ A772 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ A774              .ReadDone:
 241+ A774 1B           	dec		de
 242+ A775 AF           	xor		a
 243+ A776 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ A777 C9           	ret

 210+ A812              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?

 213+ A812              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17

 215+ A812              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ A812              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ A812              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ A812              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ A812              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ A812              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ A812              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ A812              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ A812              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ A812              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ A812              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ A812              ;
 227+ A812              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ A812              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ A812              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ A812              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ A812              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ A812              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ A812              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ A812              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ A812              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ A812              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ A812              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ A812              ;
 239+ A812              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ A812              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ A812              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ A812              ;
 243+ A812              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ A812              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ A812              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ A812              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ A812              ;
 248+ A812              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ A812              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ A812              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ A812              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ A812              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ A812              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ A812              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ A812              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ A812              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ A812              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ A812              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ A812              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ A812              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ A812              ;
 262+ A812              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ A812              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ A812              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ A812              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ A812              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ A812              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ A812              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ A812              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ A812              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ A812              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ A812              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ A812              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ A812              ;
 275+ A812              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ A812              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ A812              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ A812              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ A812              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ A812              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ A812              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ A812              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ A812              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ A812              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ A812              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ A812              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ A812              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ A812              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ A812              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ A812              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ A812              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ A812              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ A812              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ A812              ;C8                      INY
 295+ A812              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ A812              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ A812              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ A812              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ A812              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ A812              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ A812              ;98                      TYA
 302+ A812              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ A812              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ A812              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ A812              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ A812              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ A812              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ A812              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ A812              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ A812              ;68                      PLA
 311+ A812              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ A812              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ A812              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ A812              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ A812              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 316+ A812              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 317+ A812              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 318+ A812              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 319+ A812              ;
 320+ A812              ;
 321+ A812              ;

   1+ A812 CB 7C        addhldesigned:          bit     7,h
   2+ A814 20 03                                jr      nz,.noneghl
   3+ A816 CD DE AE                             call    negate16hl
   4+ A819 CB 7A        .noneghl:               bit     7,d
   5+ A81B 20 03                                jr      nz,.nonegde
   6+ A81D CD E5 AE                             call    negate16de
   7+ A820 19           .nonegde:               add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
   8+ A821 AF                                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
   9+ A822 CB 7C                                bit     7,h
  10+ A824 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early

1167  A82B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhlasigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
   1+ A82B              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
   2+ A82B 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
   3+ A82C 5C                                   ld      e,h
   4+ A82D 7C                                   ld      a,h
   5+ A82E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
   6+ A830 67                                   ld      h,a
   7+ A831 7A                                   ld      a,d
   8+ A832 ED 31                                add     hl,a
   9+ A834 7B                                   ld      a,e
  10+ A835 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  11+ A837 B4                                   or      h
  12+ A838 C9                                   ret
  13+ A839              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
  14+ A839 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
  15+ A83A 4F                                   ld      c,a
  16+ A83B 78                                   ld      a,b
  17+ A83C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  18+ A83E 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
  19+ A840 EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
  20+ A841 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
  21+ A843 69                                   ld      l,c
  22+ A844                                      ClearCarryFlag
  22+ A844 B7          >                        or a
  23+ A845 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
  24+ A847 C9                                   ret
  25+ A848 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
  26+ A849 ED 31                                add hl,a
  27+ A84B C9                                   ret
  28+ A84C              ;tested mathstestsun2
  29+ A84C              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
  30+ A84C 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
  31+ A84D AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
  32+ A84E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
  33+ A850 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
  34+ A852 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
  35+ A853 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
  36+ A855 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
  37+ A857 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  38+ A858 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  39+ A85A 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  40+ A85B 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  41+ A85C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  42+ A85E 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  43+ A85F 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
  44+ A860 85                                   add     l                   ; .
  45+ A861 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
  46+ A862 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
  47+ A863 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
  48+ A864 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  49+ A865 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
  50+ A866 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
  51+ A867 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
  52+ A869 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
  53+ A86A C9                                   ret                         ; done
  54+ A86B 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  55+ A86C FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
  56+ A86E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  57+ A870 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  58+ A871 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  59+ A872 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
  60+ A874 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  61+ A876 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  62+ A877 E5                                   push    hl                  ; hl = bc - de
  63+ A878 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; if bc < de then there is a carry
  64+ A87A ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
  65+ A87C E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
  66+ A87D 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
  67+ A87F 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
  68+ A881 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
  69+ A882                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
  69+ A882 BD          >                        cp      l
  69+ A883 DA 8D A8    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
  70+ A886 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
  71+ A888              ; The same so its just zero
  72+ A888 AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
  73+ A889 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
  74+ A88A 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
  75+ A88B 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
  76+ A88C C9                                   ret                        ; .
  77+ A88D              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
  78+ A88D 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
  79+ A88E 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
  80+ A88F 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
  81+ A890 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
  82+ A891 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
  83+ A892 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
  84+ A893 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
  85+ A894 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
  86+ A895 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
  87+ A896 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
  88+ A898 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
  89+ A89A B2                                   or      d                  ;
  90+ A89B 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
  91+ A89C C9                                   ret
  92+ A89D 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
  93+ A89E 95                                   sub     l                  ;
  94+ A89F 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
  95+ A8A0 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
  96+ A8A1 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
  97+ A8A2 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
  98+ A8A3 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
  99+ A8A4 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 100+ A8A5 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 101+ A8A6 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 102+ A8A8 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 103+ A8AA B2                                   or      d                  ;
 104+ A8AB 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 105+ A8AC C9                                   ret
 106+ A8AD
 107+ A8AD
 108+ A8AD              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 109+ A8AD 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 110+ A8AE 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 111+ A8AF A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 112+ A8B0 CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 113+ A8B2 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 114+ A8B4 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 115+ A8B5 C9                                   ret                             ; return
 116+ A8B6 ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 117+ A8B8 D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 118+ A8B9 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 119+ A8BA EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 120+ A8BB A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 121+ A8BC ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 122+ A8BE 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 123+ A8BF C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 124+ A8C0
 125+ A8C0
 126+ A8C0
 127+ A8C0              ; a = value to add
 128+ A8C0              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 129+ A8C0              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 130+ A8C0              addINWKbasigned:
 131+ A8C0 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 132+ A8C3 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 133+ A8C4 78           		ld		a,b
 134+ A8C5 ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 135+ A8C7 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 136+ A8C8 E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 137+ A8CA 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 138+ A8CB 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 139+ A8CC E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 140+ A8CE              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 141+ A8CE              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 142+ A8CE              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 143+ A8CE              addhlcsigned:
 144+ A8CE 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 145+ A8CF 23                   inc     hl
 146+ A8D0 56                   ld      d,(hl)
 147+ A8D1 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 148+ A8D2 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 149+ A8D3 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 150+ A8D4 A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 151+ A8D5 CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 152+ A8D7 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
 153+ A8D9              .negativecalc:
 154+ A8D9 7C                   ld      a,h
 155+ A8DA E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 156+ A8DC 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 157+ A8DD DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 158+ A8DF 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 159+ A8E1 ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
 160+ A8E3 DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 161+ A8E5 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 162+ A8E6 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 163+ A8E7 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 164+ A8E9 DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 165+ A8EB F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 166+ A8ED A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 167+ A8EE 77                   ld      (hl),a
 168+ A8EF 2B                   dec     hl
 169+ A8F0 72                   ld      (hl),d
 170+ A8F1 2B                   dec     hl
 171+ A8F2 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 172+ A8F3 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 173+ A8F4 D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 174+ A8F5              .nocarry:
 175+ A8F5 CD DE AE             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 176+ A8F8 B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
 177+ A8F9 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 178+ A8FA 73                   ld      (hl),e
 179+ A8FB 23                   inc     hl
 180+ A8FC 72                   ld      (hl),d
 181+ A8FD 23                   inc     hl
 182+ A8FE 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 183+ A8FF EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 184+ A900 C9                   ret
 185+ A901              .postivecalc:
 186+ A901 DD 68                ld      ixl,b
 187+ A903 06 00                ld      b,0
 188+ A905 19                   add     hl,de
 189+ A906 EB                   ex      de,hl
 190+ A907 DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 191+ A909 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 192+ A90A 2B                   dec     hl
 193+ A90B 72                   ld      (hl),d
 194+ A90C 2B                   dec     hl
 195+ A90D 73                   ld      (hl),e
 196+ A90E C9                   ret
 197+ A90F
 198+ A90F              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 199+ A90F              ;MVT1
 200+ A90F              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 201+ A90F              ;    A = sign bit => T
 202+ A90F              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 203+ A90F              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 204+ A90F              ;
 205+ A90F              ;        and h, 7F
 206+ A90F              ;        b = 0
 207+ A90F              ;        c = varS
 208+ A90F              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 209+ A90F              ;        retain carry
 210+ A90F              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 211+ A90F              ;        and 7F
 212+ A90F              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 213+ A90F              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 214+ A90F              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 215+ A90F              ;
 216+ A90F              ;    else
 217+ A90F              ;MV10.
 218+ A90F              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 219+ A90F              ;        or      sign bit
 220+ A90F
 221+ A90F
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm

1169  A951                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ A951              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ A951              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ A951 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ A952 E5                                   push hl
   5+ A953 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ A955 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ A957 E5                                   push hl
   8+ A958 AF                                   xor a
   9+ A959 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ A95A 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ A95B DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ A95D CB 10                                rl b
  13+ A95F ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ A961 17                                   rla
  15+ A962 B9                                   cp c
  16+ A963 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ A965 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ A967 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ A969 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ A96A 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ A96C ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ A96E 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ A96F DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ A971 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ A972 2D                                   dec l
  26+ A973 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ A974 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ A976 D1                                   pop de
  29+ A977 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ A978 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ A97A D1                                   pop de
  32+ A97B C9                                   ret
  33+ A97C
  34+ A97C FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ A97E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ A980 CD 51 A9                             call    Div24by24
  37+ A983 F5                                   push    af
  38+ A984 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ A986 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ A988 B1                                   or      c
  41+ A989 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ A98A F1                                   pop     af
  43+ A98B C9                                   ret
  44+ A98C
  45+ A98C
  46+ A98C FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ A98E A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ A98F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ A991 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ A993 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ A994 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ A996 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ A997 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ A999 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ A99B CD 51 A9                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ A99E FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ A9A0 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ A9A2 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ A9A3 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ A9A5 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ A9A6 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ A9A8 C9                                   ret
  63+ A9A9
  64+ A9A9              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ A9A9              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ A9A9              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ A9A9              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ A9A9 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ A9AA 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ A9AC 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ A9AE 3A 52 9A                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ A9B1 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ A9B2 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ A9B5 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ A9B6 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ A9B8 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ A9BA 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ A9BB ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ A9BD ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ A9BF 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ A9C1 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ A9C2 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ A9C3 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ A9C5 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ A9C6 32 53 9A                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ A9C9 C9                                   ret
  87+ A9CA
  88+ A9CA              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
  89+ A9CA              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
  90+ A9CA 32 51 99     DVID3B2:                ld      (varPhi2),a                     ;DVID3B2 \ Divide 3 bytes by 2, K = [P(HiLo).A]/[INWK_z HiLo], for planet radius, Xreg protected. ; P+2    \ num sg
  91+ A9CD                                      ldCopy2Byte UBnKzlo, varQ               ; [QR} = Ubnk zlohi  (i.e. Inwk_z HiLo)
  91+ A9CD 2A 12 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnKzlo)
  91+ A9D0 22 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),hl
  92+ A9D3 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                    ;
  93+ A9D6 32 54 9A                             ld      (varS),a                        ; S = inkw z sign
  94+ A9D9 ED 5B 4F 99  DVID3B:                 ld      de,(varP)                       ; K (3bytes)=P(Lo Hi Hi2)/S.R.Q approx  Acc equiv K(0).; get P and P+1 into de
  95+ A9DD 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; num lo
  96+ A9DE F6 01                                or      1                               ; must be at least 1
  97+ A9E0 32 4F 99                             ld      (varP),a                        ; store
  98+ A9E3 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; update DE too
  99+ A9E4 3A 51 99                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; varP Sign     E.D.A = P Lo Hi Hi2
 100+ A9E7 21 54 9A                             ld      hl,varS                         ; hl = address of VarS
 101+ A9EA AE                                   xor     (hl)                            ; A = PHi2 Xor S Signs
 102+ A9EB E6 80                                and     $80                             ;
 103+ A9ED 32 6E 9A                             ld      (varT),a                        ; T = Sign bit of A
 104+ A9F0 FD 2E 00                             ld      iyl,0                           ; iyl = yReg = counter
 105+ A9F3 3A 51 99                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ;
 106+ A9F6 E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; A = Ph2 again but minus sign bit
 107+ A9F8              DVL9:                   JumpIfAGTENusng $40,DV14                ; counter Y up; if object is over $40 away then scaled and exit Y count
 107+ A9F8 FE 40       >                        cp     $40
 107+ A9FA D2 08 AA    >                        jp		nc,DV14
 108+ A9FD                                      ShiftDELeft1                            ; de (or P,P1) > 1
 108+ A9FD CB 23       >			   sla e
 108+ A9FF CB 12       >			   rl  d
 109+ AA01 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; and accumulator as 3rd byte
 110+ AA03 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 111+ AA05 C2 F8 A9                             jp      nz,DVL9                         ; loop again with a max of 256 iterations
 112+ AA08 32 51 99     DV14:                   ld      (varPhi2),a                     ; scaled, exited Ycount
 113+ AA0B ED 53 4F 99                          ld      (varP),de                       ; store off the value so far
 114+ AA0F 3A 54 9A                             ld      a,(varS)                        ; zsign
 115+ AA12 E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; denom sg7
 116+ AA14                                      ; jp mi,DV9                             ; this can never happen as bit 7 is and'ed out
 117+ AA14 2A 52 9A                             ld      hl,(varQ)                       ; demon lo
 118+ AA17 FD 2D        DVL6:                   dec     iyl                             ; counter Y back down, roll S. ;  scale Y back
 119+ AA19                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 119+ AA19 CB 25       >			   sla l
 119+ AA1B CB 14       >			   rl  h
 120+ AA1D CB 17                                rl      a                               ; mulitply QRS by 2
 121+ AA1F F2 17 AA                             jp      p,DVL6                          ; loop roll S until Abit7 set.
 122+ AA22 22 52 9A     DV9:                    ld      (varQ),hl                       ; bmi cant enter here from above ; save off so far
 123+ AA25 32 52 9A                             ld      (varQ),a                        ; Q \ mostly empty so now reuse as hi denom
 124+ AA28 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE                           ;  Xreg protected so can't LL28+4
 125+ AA2A 32 53 9A                             ld      (varR),a                        ;  R
 126+ AA2D 3A 51 99                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; P+2 \ big numerator
 127+ AA30 CD A9 A9                             call    PROJ256mulAdivQ                 ; TODO LL31\ R now =A*256/Q
 128+ AA33 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 129+ AA35 32 66 9A                             ld      (varKp1),a
 130+ AA38 32 67 9A                             ld      (varKp2),a
 131+ AA3B 32 68 9A                             ld      (varKp3),a                      ; clear out K+1 to K+3
 132+ AA3E FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl                           ; Y counter for scale
 133+ AA40                                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,DV12                 ; Ycount +ve
 133+ AA40 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 133+ AA42 CA 6D AA    >                        jp      z,DV12
 134+ AA45 3A 53 9A                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; R     \ else Y count is -ve, Acc = remainder.
 135+ AA48 ED 5B 65 9A                          ld      de,(varK)                       ; d= k1
 136+ AA4C 2A 69 9A                             ld      hl,(varK2)                      ; h = k3, l = k2
 137+ AA4F 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; use e to hold K0 pulled from a
 138+ AA50 CB 27        DVL8:                   sla     a                               ; boost up a                     ;  counter Y up
 139+ AA52 CB 12                                rl      d                               ; k1
 140+ AA54 CB 15                                rl      l                               ; k2
 141+ AA56 CB 14                                rl      h                               ; k3
 142+ AA58 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 143+ AA5A 20 F4                                jr      nz,DVL8                         ;
 144+ AA5C ED 53 65 9A  DVL8Save:               ld      (varK),de
 145+ AA60 22 69 9A                             ld      (varK2),hl                      ; save back K0 to k3
 146+ AA63 3A 6E 9A                             ld      a,(varT)
 147+ AA66 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; get varT into c reg
 148+ AA67 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; a= k3 (sign)
 149+ AA68 B1                                   or      c                               ; merge in varT (sign)that was saved much earlier up)
 150+ AA69 32 78 9A                             ld      (varK3),a                       ; load sign bit back into K3
 151+ AA6C C9                                   ret
 152+ AA6D              DV12:                   JumpIfAIsZero   DV13                    ; Y Count zerp, go to DV13
 152+ AA6D A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 152+ AA6E CA 85 AA    >                        jp	z, DV13
 153+ AA71 3A 53 9A                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; Reduce Remainder
 154+ AA74 CB 3F        DVL10:                  srl     a                               ; divide by 2                     ; counter Y reduce
 155+ AA76 FD 2D                                dec     iyl
 156+ AA78 C2 74 AA                             jp      nz,DVL10                        ; loop y reduce until y is zero
 157+ AA7B 32 65 9A                             ld      (varK),a                        ; k Lo
 158+ AA7E                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 158+ AA7E 3A 6E 9A    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 158+ AA81 32 68 9A    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 159+ AA84 C9                                   ret
 160+ AA85              DV13:                   ldCopyByte  varR,varK                   ; R \ already correct so copy to K lo;DV13   \ Ycount zero \ K(1to2) already = 0
 160+ AA85 3A 53 9A    >                        ld       a,(varR)
 160+ AA88 32 65 9A    >                        ld       (varK),a
 161+ AA8B                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 161+ AA8B 3A 6E 9A    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 161+ AA8E 32 68 9A    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 162+ AA91 C9                                   ret
 163+ AA92
 164+ AA92
 165+ AA92 CD CA A9     PLS6:                   call    DVID3B2                         ; Returns AHL K ( 2 1 0 )
 166+ AA95 3A 68 9A                             ld      a,(varKp3)
 167+ AA98 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 168+ AA9A 21 67 9A                             ld      hl,varKp2
 169+ AA9D B6                                   or      (hl)
 170+ AA9E C2 B3 AA                             jp      nz,PL44TooBig
 171+ AAA1 3A 66 9A                             ld      a,(varKp1)
 172+ AAA4 FE 04                                cp      4                               ; if high byte > 4 then total > 1024 so too big
 173+ AAA6 30 0B                                jr      nc,PL44TooBig
 174+ AAA8                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; we have a good result regardless
 174+ AAA8 B7          >                        or a
 175+ AAA9 2A 65 9A                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; get K (0 1)
 176+ AAAC 3A 68 9A                             ld      a,(varKp3)                      ; if sign bit high?
 177+ AAAF CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 178+ AAB1 C8                                   ret     z                               ; no so we can just return
 179+ AAB2 C9           PL44:                   ret
 180+ AAB3 37           PL44TooBig:             scf
 181+ AAB4 C9                                   ret

   1+ AAB5              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ AAB5 2A 53 9A                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ AAB8 3A 52 9A                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ AABB C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ AABD 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ AAC0 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ AAC1                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ AAC1 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ AAC3 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ AAC5 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ AAC7 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ AAC9 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ AACA 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ AACB EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ AACC              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ AACC CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ AACE CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ AAD0 CB 20                                sla b

  17+ AAD6 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ AAD7 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ AAD9 C9                                   ret
  20+ AADA
  21+ AADA
  22+ AADA              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ AADA ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ AADA ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ AADA ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ AADA ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ AADA ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ AADA ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ AADA ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ AADA ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ AADA ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ AADA ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ AADA ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ AADA ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ AADA ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ AADA ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ AADA ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ AADA ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ AADA                                      ENDM
  40+ AADA
  41+ AADA
  42+ AADA
  43+ AADA                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ AADA              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ AADA 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ AADB 3A 52 9A    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ AADE 5F          >                        ld      e,a

  44+ AAE0 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit

  44+ AAEE B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ AAEF 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ AAF0 2A 53 9A     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ AAF3 CD FC AA                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ AAF6 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ AAF7                                      ClearCarryFlag

  54+ AAFC 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ AAFD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ AAFF 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ AB00 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ AB01                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ AB01 FA 19 AB    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ AB04 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ AB05 B2                                   or      d
  61+ AB06                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ AB06 FA 0B AB    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ AB09 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ AB0A C9                                   ret
  64+ AB0B 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ AB0C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ AB0E 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ AB0F 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ AB10 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ AB12 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ AB13 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ AB14 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ AB16 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ AB17 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ AB18 C9                                   ret
  75+ AB19 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ AB1A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ AB1C 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ AB1D 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ AB1E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ AB20 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ AB21 B7                                   or      a
  82+ AB22 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ AB24 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ AB26 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ AB27 B4                                   or      h
  86+ AB28 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ AB29 C9                                   ret
  88+ AB2A              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ AB2A AF          >                    xor a
  88+ AB2B 95          >                    sub l
  88+ AB2C 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ AB2D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ AB2E 94          >                    sub h
  88+ AB2F 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ AB30 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ AB31 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ AB33 B4                                   or      h
  92+ AB34 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ AB35 C9                                   ret
