  95+ AB36
  96+ AB36                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ AB36                  ;
  98+ AB36                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ AB36                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ AB36                  ;
 101+ AB36                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ AB36                  ;         carry reset
 103+ AB36                  ;
 104+ AB36                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ AB36 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ AB37 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ AB38 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ AB3A EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ AB3B ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ AB3D
 111+ AB3D 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ AB3E 85                                   add a,l
 113+ AB3F 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ AB40 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ AB41
 116+ AB41 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ AB42 CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ AB44 C9                                   ret
 119+ AB45
 120+ AB45
 121+ AB45
 122+ AB45                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ AB45                 ;
 124+ AB45                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ AB45                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ AB45                 ;
 127+ AB45                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ AB45                 ;         carry reset
 129+ AB45                 ;
 130+ AB45                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ AB45
 132+ AB45
 133+ AB45
 134+ AB45 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ AB46 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ AB47 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ AB48 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ AB49 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ AB4A 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ AB4B              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ AB4B ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ AB4D EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ AB4E ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ AB50
 145+ AB50 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ AB51 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ AB52 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ AB53
 149+ AB53 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ AB54 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ AB55 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ AB57
 153+ AB57 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ AB58 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ AB59
 156+ AB59 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ AB5A 85                                   add a,l
 158+ AB5B 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ AB5C 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ AB5D
 161+ AB5D D1                                   pop de
 162+ AB5E ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ AB60
 164+ AB60 EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ AB61 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ AB63 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ AB64
 168+ AB64 C9                                   ret
 169+ AB65
 170+ AB65              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ AB65              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ AB65              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ AB65              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ AB65              ;         carry reset
 175+ AB65              ; maths is
 176+ AB65              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ AB65              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ AB65              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ AB65              ;
 180+ AB65              ;
 181+ AB65              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ AB65 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ AB66 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ AB67 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ AB68 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ AB69 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ AB6A 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ AB6B ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ AB6D EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ AB6E ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ AB70 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ AB71 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ AB72 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ AB73 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ AB75 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ AB76 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ AB77 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ AB78 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ AB79                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ AB79 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ AB7A C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ AB7B C9                                   ret
 203+ AB7C
 204+ AB7C
 205+ AB7C              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 206+ AB7C              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 207+ AB7C 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 208+ AB7D AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 209+ AB7E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 210+ AB80 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 211+ AB82 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 212+ AB83 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 213+ AB85 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 214+ AB86 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 215+ AB87 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 216+ AB89              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 217+ AB89 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 218+ AB8A 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 219+ AB8B ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 220+ AB8D 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 221+ AB8E 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 222+ AB8F 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 223+ AB90 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 224+ AB91 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 225+ AB92 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 226+ AB93 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 227+ AB95 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 228+ AB96 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 229+ AB97 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 230+ AB98 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 231+ AB99 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 232+ AB9A 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 233+ AB9B 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 234+ AB9C ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 235+ AB9E 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 236+ AB9F 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 237+ ABA0 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 238+ ABA2 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 239+ ABA3 C9                                   ret
 240+ ABA4
 241+ ABA4              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 242+ ABA4              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 243+ ABA4              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 244+ ABA4              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 245+ ABA4              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 246+ ABA4
 247+ ABA4              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 248+ ABA4              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 249+ ABA4              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 250+ ABA4 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 251+ ABA5 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 252+ ABA6 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 253+ ABA8 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 254+ ABAA 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 255+ ABAB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 256+ ABAD 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 257+ ABAE 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 258+ ABAF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 259+ ABB1 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 260+ ABB2              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 261+ ABB2 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 262+ ABB4 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 263+ ABB5 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 264+ ABB6 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; save carry and get back multiplier
 265+ ABB7 08                                   ex      af,af'
 266+ ABB8 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 267+ ABB9 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 268+ ABBA ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 269+ ABBC 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; .
 270+ ABBD 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + carry byte
 271+ ABBE 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 272+ ABBF 7A                                   ld      a,d
 273+ ABC0 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 274+ ABC1 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; e = H * D
 275+ ABC2 57                                   ld      d,a
 276+ ABC3 ED 30                                mul     de
 277+ ABC5 08                                   ex      af,af'
 278+ ABC6 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 279+ ABC7 5F                                   ld      e,a
 280+ ABC8 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 281+ ABCA C9                                   ret
 282+ ABCB
 283+ ABCB
 284+ ABCB              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 285+ ABCB              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 286+ ABCB              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 287+ ABCB              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 288+ ABCB              ;         carry reset
 289+ ABCB              ;
 290+ ABCB              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 291+ ABCB 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 292+ ABCC AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 293+ ABCD 32 CB AB                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 294+ ABD0 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 295+ ABD1 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 296+ ABD4 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 297+ ABD6 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 298+ ABD8 57                                   ld      d,a
 299+ ABD9 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 300+ ABDB 32 CB AB                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 301+ ABDE 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 302+ ABDF ED 27 80                             test    $80
 303+ ABE2 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 304+ ABE4 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 305+ ABE6 67                                   ld      h,a
 306+ ABE7 3A CB AB                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 307+ ABEA EE 80                                xor     $80
 308+ ABEC 32 CB AB                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 309+ ABEF CD 65 AB     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 310+ ABF2 3A CB AB     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 311+ ABF5 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 312+ ABF8 C8                                   ret     z
 313+ ABF9 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 314+ ABFA 95                                   sub 	l
 315+ ABFB 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 316+ ABFC 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 317+ ABFD 94                                   sub 	h
 318+ ABFE 67                                   ld 		h,a
 319+ ABFF C9                                   ret
 320+ AC00
 321+ AC00 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 322+ AC01 32 CB AB                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 323+ AC04 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 324+ AC05 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 325+ AC08 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 326+ AC0A E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 327+ AC0C 57                                   ld      d,a
 328+ AC0D 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 329+ AC0F 32 CB AB                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 330+ AC12 CD 65 AB     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 331+ AC15 3A CB AB     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 332+ AC18 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 333+ AC1B C8                                   ret     z
 334+ AC1C AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 335+ AC1D 95                                   sub 	l
 336+ AC1E 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 337+ AC1F 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 338+ AC20 94                                   sub 	h
 339+ AC21 67                                   ld 		h,a
 340+ AC22 C9                                   ret
 341+ AC23
 342+ AC23
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
1171  AC23                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ AC23              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ AC23              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ AC23
   4+ AC23              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ AC23 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ AC23 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ AC23 ~            			mul
   8+ AC23              			ENDM
   9+ AC23
  10+ AC23              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ AC23 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ AC23 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ AC23 ~            			mul
  14+ AC23 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ AC23              			ENDM
  16+ AC23
  17+ AC23
  18+ AC23              asm_squa:
  19+ AC23 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ AC25              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ AC25              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ AC25              asm_squa2:
  23+ AC25 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ AC26 57           	ld d,a
  25+ AC27 ED 30        	mul
  26+ AC29 ED 53 4F 99  	ld (varP),de
  27+ AC2D 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ AC2E C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
1172  AC2F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ AC2F              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ AC2F              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ AC2F              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ AC2F              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ AC2F              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ AC2F              asm_sqrt:
   7+ AC2F 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ AC32 61           	ld h,c
   9+ AC33 69           	ld l,c
  10+ AC34              .sqrloop:
  11+ AC34 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ AC36 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ AC38 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ AC39 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ AC3A ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ AC3C 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ AC3E EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ AC3F 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ AC40 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ AC42              .sqrbit:
  21+ AC42 19           	add hl,de
  22+ AC43 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ AC44 B7           	or a
  24+ AC45 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ AC47              .sqrfi:
  26+ AC47 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ AC49 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ AC4B CB 38        	srl b
  29+ AC4D CB 19        	rr c
  30+ AC4F 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ AC51 C9           	ret
  32+ AC52
  33+ AC52
  34+ AC52              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ AC52 3A 52 9A     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ AC55 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ AC56 3A 53 9A     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ AC59 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ AC5A CD 2F AC     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ AC5D 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ AC5E 32 52 9A     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ AC61 C9           	ret
  43+ AC62
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1173  AC62                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ AC62              ;
   2+ AC62              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   3+ AC62              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   4+ AC62              ;           if carry was 0
   5+ AC62              ;               if a >= D
   6+ AC62              ;                   A = A - D
   7+ AC62              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
   8+ AC62              ;           else
   9+ AC62
  10+ AC62              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  11+ AC62              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  12+ AC62              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  13+ AC62              ;
  14+ AC62              ;
  15+ AC62              ;
  16+ AC62
  17+ AC62              AEquAmul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
  17+ AC62 BA          >                        cp     d
  17+ AC63 D2 81 AC    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
  18+ AC66 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
  19+ AC68 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
  20+ AC6A 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
  21+ AC6C                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
  21+ AC6C BA          >                        cp      d
  21+ AC6D DA 72 AC    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
  22+ AC70 92                                   sub     d
  23+ AC71                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
  23+ AC71 B7          >                        or a
  24+ AC72              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  24+ AC72 3F          >                        ccf
  25+ AC73 CB 13                                rl      e
  26+ AC75 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
  27+ AC77 7B                                   ld      a,e
  28+ AC78 C9                                   ret
  29+ AC79 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  30+ AC7A                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  30+ AC7A 37          >                        scf
  31+ AC7B CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  32+ AC7D 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  33+ AC7F 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  34+ AC80 C9                                   ret
  35+ AC81 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  36+ AC83 C9                                   ret
  37+ AC84
  38+ AC84
  39+ AC84              ; Divide 8-bit values
  40+ AC84              ; In: Divide E by divider C
  41+ AC84              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
  42+ AC84              ;
  43+ AC84              ;;;Div8:
  44+ AC84              ;;;    xor a
  45+ AC84              ;;;    ld b,8
  46+ AC84              ;;;Div8_Loop:
  47+ AC84              ;;;    rl e
  48+ AC84              ;;;    rla
  49+ AC84              ;;;    sub c
  50+ AC84              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  51+ AC84              ;;;    add a,c
  52+ AC84              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  53+ AC84              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  54+ AC84              ;;;    ld b,a0
  55+ AC84              ;;;    ld a,e
  56+ AC84              ;;;    rla
  57+ AC84              ;;;    cpl
  58+ AC84              ;;;    ret
  59+ AC84
  60+ AC84              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  61+ AC84              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  62+ AC84              ;;         A is a copy of E
  63+ AC84              ;;         HL is the remainder
  64+ AC84              ;;         BC is not changed
  65+ AC84              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  66+ AC84              ;140 bytes
  67+ AC84              ;145cc
  68+ AC84
  69+ AC84              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  70+ AC84 ~                                rla
  71+ AC84 ~                                adc     hl,hl
  72+ AC84 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  73+ AC84 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  74+ AC84 ~                                add     hl,bc
  75+ AC84                                  ENDM
  76+ AC84
  77+ AC84              DEequDEDivBC:
  78+ AC84 AF               xor a
  79+ AC85 ED 62            sbc hl,hl
  80+ AC87 7A               ld a,d
  81+ AC88                  MacroDEDivBC
  81+ AC88 17          >                    rla
  81+ AC89 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  81+ AC8B ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  81+ AC8D 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  81+ AC8F 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  82+ AC90                  MacroDEDivBC
  82+ AC90 17          >                    rla
  82+ AC91 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  82+ AC93 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  82+ AC95 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  82+ AC97 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  83+ AC98                  MacroDEDivBC
  83+ AC98 17          >                    rla
  83+ AC99 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  83+ AC9B ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  83+ AC9D 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  83+ AC9F 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  84+ ACA0                  MacroDEDivBC
  84+ ACA0 17          >                    rla
  84+ ACA1 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  84+ ACA3 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  84+ ACA5 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  84+ ACA7 09          >                    add     hl,bc

  85+ ACAB ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc

 106+ AD10
 107+ AD10
 108+ AD10
 109+ AD10              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 110+ AD10              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 111+ AD10              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 112+ AD10              ; Our use
 113+ AD10              ; BC = A0
 114+ AD10              ; DE = 0C
 115+ AD10              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 116+ AD10              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 116+ AD10 B9          >                        cp     c
 116+ AD11 D2 3C AD    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 117+ AD14 47                                   ld      b,a
 118+ AD15 59                                   ld      e,c
 119+ AD16 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 120+ AD18 16 00                                ld      d,0
 121+ AD1A C3 27 AD                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 122+ AD1D 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 123+ AD1E 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 124+ AD20 21 52 9A                             ld      hl,varQ
 125+ AD23 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 126+ AD24 16 00                                ld      d,0
 127+ AD26 5F                                   ld      e,a
 128+ AD27              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 129+ AD27 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 130+ AD2A 78                                   ld      a,b
 131+ AD2B 06 10                                ld      b,16
 132+ AD2D CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 133+ AD2F 17                                   rla			; ...
 134+ AD30 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 135+ AD32 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 136+ AD34 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 137+ AD36 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 138+ AD37 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 139+ AD38 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 140+ AD3A 47                                   ld   b,a
 141+ AD3B C9                                   ret
 142+ AD3C 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 143+ AD3F C9                                   ret
 144+ AD40
 145+ AD40              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 146+ AD40 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 147+ AD42 AF                                   xor a
 148+ AD43 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 149+ AD45 17                                   rla
 150+ AD46 BA                                   cp d
 151+ AD47 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 151+ AD49
 152+ AD49 0C                                   inc c
 153+ AD4A 92                                   sub d
 154+ AD4B 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 155+ AD4D C9                                   ret
 156+ AD4E              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 157+ AD4E 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 158+ AD50 AF                                   xor a
 159+ AD51 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 160+ AD53 CB 14                                rl	h
 161+ AD55              ;    add hl,hl
 162+ AD55 17                                   rla
 163+ AD56 B9                                   cp c
 164+ AD57 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 165+ AD59 2C                                   inc l
 166+ AD5A 91                                   sub c
 167+ AD5B 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 168+ AD5D C9                                   ret
 169+ AD5E              ;
 170+ AD5E              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 171+ AD5E              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 172+ AD5E              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 173+ AD5E              ;
 174+ AD5E              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 175+ AD5E ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 176+ AD5E ~            					rla				; ...
 177+ AD5E ~            					cp	c			; ...
 178+ AD5E ~            					jr	1F
 179+ AD5E ~            					sub	c			; ...
 180+ AD5E ~            1:
 181+ AD5E ~            					inc	l			; ...
 182+ AD5E              					ENDM
 183+ AD5E
 184+ AD5E
 185+ AD5E
 186+ AD5E              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 187+ AD5E 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 188+ AD61 78                               ld a,b
 189+ AD62 06 08                            ld b,8
 190+ AD64 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 191+ AD65 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 192+ AD67 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 193+ AD69 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 194+ AD6B 19                               add hl,de
 195+ AD6C 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 196+ AD6E 17                               rla
 197+ AD6F 2F                               cpl
 198+ AD70 47                               ld b,a
 199+ AD71 79                               ld a,c
 200+ AD72 48                               ld c,b
 201+ AD73 06 08                            ld b,8
 202+ AD75 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 203+ AD76 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 204+ AD78 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 205+ AD7A 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 206+ AD7C 19                               add hl,de
 207+ AD7D 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 208+ AD7F 17                               rla
 209+ AD80 2F                               cpl
 210+ AD81 41                               ld b,c
 211+ AD82 4F                               ld c,a
 212+ AD83 C9                               ret
 213+ AD84
 214+ AD84
 215+ AD84
 216+ AD84              BCDIVDE_Iteration: MACRO
 217+ AD84 ~            				   rla
 218+ AD84 ~            				   adc	hl,hl
 219+ AD84 ~            				   add	hl,de
 220+ AD84 ~            				   jr	c,1F
 221+ AD84 ~            				   sbc	hl,de
 222+ AD84 ~            1:
 223+ AD84              				   ENDM
 224+ AD84
 225+ AD84
 226+ AD84              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 227+ AD84              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 228+ AD84              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 229+ AD84              ;min: 738cc
 230+ AD84              ;max: 898cc
 231+ AD84              ;avg: 818cc
 232+ AD84              ;144 bytes
 233+ AD84 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 234+ AD85 67                                   ld h,a
 235+ AD86 6F                                   ld l,a
 236+ AD87 93                                   sub e
 237+ AD88 5F                                   ld e,a
 238+ AD89 9F                                   sbc a,a
 239+ AD8A 92                                   sub d
 240+ AD8B 57                                   ld d,a
 241+ AD8C 78                                   ld a,b
 242+ AD8D                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 242+ AD8D 17          >				   rla
 242+ AD8E ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 242+ AD90 19          >				   add	hl,de
 242+ AD91 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 242+ AD93 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 242+ AD95             >1:
 243+ AD95                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 243+ AD95 17          >				   rla
 243+ AD96 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 243+ AD98 19          >				   add	hl,de
 243+ AD99 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 243+ AD9B ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 243+ AD9D             >1:
 244+ AD9D                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 244+ AD9D 17          >				   rla
 244+ AD9E ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 244+ ADA0 19          >				   add	hl,de
 244+ ADA1 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 244+ ADA3 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 244+ ADA5             >1:
 245+ ADA5                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 245+ ADA5 17          >				   rla
 245+ ADA6 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 245+ ADA8 19          >				   add	hl,de
 245+ ADA9 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 245+ ADAB ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 245+ ADAD             >1:
 246+ ADAD                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 246+ ADAD 17          >				   rla
 246+ ADAE ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 246+ ADB0 19          >				   add	hl,de
 246+ ADB1 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 246+ ADB3 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 246+ ADB5             >1:
 247+ ADB5                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 247+ ADB5 17          >				   rla
 247+ ADB6 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 247+ ADB8 19          >				   add	hl,de
 247+ ADB9 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 247+ ADBB ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 247+ ADBD             >1:
 248+ ADBD                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 248+ ADBD 17          >				   rla
 248+ ADBE ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 248+ ADC0 19          >				   add	hl,de
 248+ ADC1 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 248+ ADC3 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 248+ ADC5             >1:
 249+ ADC5                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 249+ ADC5 17          >				   rla
 249+ ADC6 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 249+ ADC8 19          >				   add	hl,de
 249+ ADC9 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 249+ ADCB ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 249+ ADCD             >1:
 250+ ADCD 17                                   rla
 251+ ADCE 47                                   ld b,a
 252+ ADCF
 253+ ADCF 79                                   ld a,c
 254+ ADD0                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 254+ ADD0 17          >				   rla
 254+ ADD1 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 254+ ADD3 19          >				   add	hl,de
 254+ ADD4 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 254+ ADD6 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 254+ ADD8             >1:
 255+ ADD8                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 255+ ADD8 17          >				   rla
 255+ ADD9 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 255+ ADDB 19          >				   add	hl,de
 255+ ADDC 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 255+ ADDE ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 255+ ADE0             >1:
 256+ ADE0                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 256+ ADE0 17          >				   rla
 256+ ADE1 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 256+ ADE3 19          >				   add	hl,de
 256+ ADE4 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 256+ ADE6 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 256+ ADE8             >1:
 257+ ADE8                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 257+ ADE8 17          >				   rla
 257+ ADE9 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 257+ ADEB 19          >				   add	hl,de
 257+ ADEC 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 257+ ADEE ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 257+ ADF0             >1:
 258+ ADF0                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 258+ ADF0 17          >				   rla
 258+ ADF1 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 258+ ADF3 19          >				   add	hl,de
 258+ ADF4 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 258+ ADF6 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 258+ ADF8             >1:
 259+ ADF8                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 259+ ADF8 17          >				   rla
 259+ ADF9 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 259+ ADFB 19          >				   add	hl,de
 259+ ADFC 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 259+ ADFE ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 259+ AE00             >1:
 260+ AE00                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 260+ AE00 17          >				   rla
 260+ AE01 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 260+ AE03 19          >				   add	hl,de
 260+ AE04 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 260+ AE06 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 260+ AE08             >1:
 261+ AE08                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 261+ AE08 17          >				   rla
 261+ AE09 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 261+ AE0B 19          >				   add	hl,de
 261+ AE0C 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 261+ AE0E ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 261+ AE10             >1:
 262+ AE10 17                                   rla
 263+ AE11 4F                                   ld c,a
 264+ AE12 C9                                   ret
 265+ AE13
 266+ AE13              ;Inputs:
 267+ AE13              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 268+ AE13              ;Outputs:
 269+ AE13              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 270+ AE13              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 271+ AE13              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 272+ AE13              ;Otherwise:
 273+ AE13              ;min: 1107cc
 274+ AE13              ;max: 1319cc
 275+ AE13              ;avg: 1201cc
 276+ AE13 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 277+ AE14 AA                                   xor d
 278+ AE15 F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 279+ AE16              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 280+ AE16 A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 281+ AE17 F2 20 AE                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 282+ AE1A AF                                   xor a
 283+ AE1B 91                                   sub c
 284+ AE1C 4F                                   ld c,a
 285+ AE1D 9F                                   sbc a,a
 286+ AE1E 90                                   sub b
 287+ AE1F 47                                   ld b,a
 288+ AE20 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 289+ AE21 B2                                   or d
 290+ AE22 FA 2B AE                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 291+ AE25 AF                                   xor a
 292+ AE26 93                                   sub e
 293+ AE27 5F                                   ld e,a
 294+ AE28 9F                                   sbc a,a
 295+ AE29 92                                   sub d
 296+ AE2A 57                                   ld d,a
 297+ AE2B B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 298+ AE2C 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 299+ AE2E 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 300+ AE30 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 301+ AE31 83                                   add a,e
 302+ AE32 7A                                   ld a,d
 303+ AE33 8C                                   adc a,h
 304+ AE34 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 305+ AE36 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 306+ AE37 79                                   ld a,c
 307+ AE38 CD 53 AE                             call div_fixed88_sub
 308+ AE3B 4F                                   ld c,a
 309+ AE3C 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 310+ AE3D CD 53 AE                             call div_fixed88_sub
 311+ AE40 51                                   ld d,c
 312+ AE41 5F                                   ld e,a
 313+ AE42 F1                                   pop af
 314+ AE43 F0                                   ret p
 315+ AE44 AF                                   xor a
 316+ AE45 93                                   sub e
 317+ AE46 5F                                   ld e,a
 318+ AE47 9F                                   sbc a,a
 319+ AE48 92                                   sub d
 320+ AE49 57                                   ld d,a
 321+ AE4A C9                                   ret
 322+ AE4B
 323+ AE4B 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 324+ AE4E F1                                   pop af
 325+ AE4F F0                                   ret p
 326+ AE50 13                                   inc de
 327+ AE51 1C                                   inc e
 328+ AE52 C9                                   ret
 329+ AE53
 330+ AE53              ;min: 456cc
 331+ AE53              ;max: 536cc
 332+ AE53              ;avg: 496cc
 333+ AE53 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 334+ AE55 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 335+ AE56 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 336+ AE58 19                                   add hl,de
 337+ AE59 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 338+ AE5B ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 339+ AE5D 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 340+ AE5F 8F                                   adc a,a
 341+ AE60 C9                                   ret
 342+ AE61
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
1174  AE61                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ AE61              asm_tis2:
   2+ AE61              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ AE61              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ AE61 F5           	push af
   5+ AE62 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ AE64 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ AE65 3A 52 9A     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ AE68 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ AE69 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ AE6A BB           	cp e
  11+ AE6B 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ AE6D 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ AE6F ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ AE71 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ AE72 3A 52 9A     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ AE75 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ AE76 CD 4E AD     	call asm_div16
  18+ AE79 F1           	pop af
  19+ AE7A E6 80        	and $80
  20+ AE7C B5           	or l
  21+ AE7D C9           	ret
  22+ AE7E              .tis2_set96:
  23+ AE7E F1           	pop af
  24+ AE7F E6 80        	and $80
  25+ AE81 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ AE83 C9           	ret
  27+ AE84
  28+ AE84
  29+ AE84              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ AE84              squareregfx:
  31+ AE84 3A 83 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ AE87 57           	ld d,a
  33+ AE88 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ AE89 ED 30        	mul
  35+ AE8B EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ AE8C              squareregfy:
  37+ AE8C 3A 85 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ AE8F 57           	ld d,a
  39+ AE90 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ AE91 ED 30        	mul
  41+ AE93 19           	add hl,de
  42+ AE94              squareregfz:
  43+ AE94 3A 87 C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ AE97 57           	ld d,a
  45+ AE98 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ AE99 ED 30        	mul
  47+ AE9B 19           	add hl,de
  48+ AE9C EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ AE9D              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ AE9D CD 2F AC     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ AEA0 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ AEA1 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ AEA2 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ AEA3              normfx:
  55+ AEA3 3A 83 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ AEA6 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ AEA7 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ AEA8 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ AEA9 CD 61 AE     	call asm_tis2
  60+ AEAC 32 83 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ AEAF              normfy:
  62+ AEAF 3A 85 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ AEB2 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ AEB3 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ AEB4 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ AEB5 CD 61 AE     	call asm_tis2
  67+ AEB8 32 85 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ AEBB              normfz:
  69+ AEBB 3A 87 C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ AEBE E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ AEBF 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ AEC0 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ AEC1 CD 61 AE     	call asm_tis2
  74+ AEC4 32 87 C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ AEC7              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ AEC7 C9           	ret
  77+ AEC8
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
1175  AEC8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ AEC8              ; Input:
   2+ AEC8              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ AEC8              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ AEC8              ; Output:
   5+ AEC8              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ AEC8              ;
   7+ AEC8              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ AEC8              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ AEC8              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ AEC8              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ AEC8              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ AEC8              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ AEC8              ;
  14+ AEC8
  15+ AEC8 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ AEC9 A7                               and     a
  17+ AECA ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ AECC E1                               pop     hl
  19+ AECD C9                               ret
  20+ AECE
  21+ AECE              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ AECE              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ AECE
  24+ AECE E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ AED0 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ AED1 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ AED3 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ AED4 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ AED5 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ AED7 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ AED8 A7                               and     a
  32+ AED9 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ AEDB D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ AEDD C9                               ret
  35+ AEDE
  36+ AEDE
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
1176  AEDE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ AEDE              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ AEDE              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ AEDE              negate16:
   4+ AEDE              negate16hl:
   5+ AEDE                      ; Input:
   6+ AEDE                      ;       HL = value
   7+ AEDE                      ; Output:
   8+ AEDE                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ AEDE                      ; Destroys:
  10+ AEDE                      ;       AF
  11+ AEDE                      ;
  12+ AEDE AF           	xor 	a
  13+ AEDF 95           	sub 	l
  14+ AEE0 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ AEE1 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ AEE2 94           	sub 	h
  17+ AEE3 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ AEE4 C9           	ret
  19+ AEE5
  20+ AEE5              negate16de:
  21+ AEE5 AF           	xor 	a
  22+ AEE6 93           	sub 	e
  23+ AEE7 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ AEE8 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ AEE9 92           	sub 	d
  26+ AEEA 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ AEEB C9           	ret
  28+ AEEC
  29+ AEEC              negate16bc:
  30+ AEEC AF           	xor 	a
  31+ AEED 91           	sub 	c
  32+ AEEE 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ AEEF 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ AEF0 90           	sub 	b
  35+ AEF1 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ AEF2 C9           	ret
  37+ AEF3
  38+ AEF3
  39+ AEF3              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ AEF3 ~            					xor 	a
  41+ AEF3 ~            					sub 	l
  42+ AEF3 ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ AEF3 ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ AEF3 ~            					sub 	h
  45+ AEF3 ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ AEF3              					ENDM
  47+ AEF3
  48+ AEF3              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ AEF3 ~            					xor 	a
  50+ AEF3 ~                                sub 	e
  51+ AEF3 ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ AEF3 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ AEF3 ~                                sub 	d
  54+ AEF3 ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ AEF3              					ENDM
  56+ AEF3              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ AEF3 ~            					xor 	a
  58+ AEF3 ~                                sub 	c
  59+ AEF3 ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ AEF3 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ AEF3 ~                                sub 	b
  62+ AEF3 ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ AEF3              					ENDM
  64+ AEF3
  65+ AEF3              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ AEF3 ~            					xor 	a
  67+ AEF3 ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ AEF3 ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ AEF3 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ AEF3 ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ AEF3 ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ AEF3              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
1177  AEF3                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ AEF3 DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ AEF5                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ AEF5 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ AEF6 D2 0B AF    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ AEF9 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ AEFA CD 40 AD                             call		asm_div8
   5+ AEFD 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ AEFE CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ AF00 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ AF01 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ AF03 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ AF04 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ AF05 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ AF07 E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ AF09 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ AF0A C9                                   ret
  15+ AF0B              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ AF0B              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ AF0B DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ AF0D E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ AF0F F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ AF11 C9                                   ret
  21+ AF12
  22+ AF12
  23+ AF12
  24+ AF12
  25+ AF12              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ AF12                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ AF12 3A 83 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ AF15 DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ AF17 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ AF19              N96SQX:
  31+ AF19              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ AF19 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ AF1A 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ AF1B ED 30       >			mul
  32+ AF1D 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ AF1E 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ AF1F              N96SQY:
  35+ AF1F 3A 84 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ AF22 DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ AF24 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ AF26              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ AF26 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ AF27 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ AF28 ED 30       >			mul
  39+ AF2A 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ AF2B              N96SQZ:
  41+ AF2B 3A 85 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ AF2E FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ AF30 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ AF32              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ AF32 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ AF33 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ AF34 ED 30       >			mul
  45+ AF36              N96SQADD:
  46+ AF36 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ AF37 EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ AF38              N96SQRT:
  49+ AF38 CD 2F AC     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ AF3B              N96NORMX:
  51+ AF3B 3A 83 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ AF3E E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ AF40 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ AF41 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ AF42 CD 69 B1     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ AF45 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ AF46 DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ AF48 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ AF4A B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ AF4B 32 83 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ AF4E              N96NORMY:
  62+ AF4E 3A 84 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ AF51 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ AF53 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ AF54 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ AF55 CD 69 B1     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ AF58 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ AF59 DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ AF5B E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ AF5D B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ AF5E 32 84 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ AF61              N96NORMZ:
  73+ AF61 3A 85 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ AF64 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ AF66 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ AF67 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ AF68 CD 69 B1     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ AF6B 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ AF6C FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ AF6E E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ AF70 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ AF71 32 85 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ AF74 C9           	ret
  84+ AF75
  85+ AF75              ; Normalise vector
  86+ AF75              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  87+ AF75              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  88+ AF75              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  89+ AF75              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  90+ AF75              ;
  91+ AF75              ;
  92+ AF75              ;
  93+ AF75
  94+ AF75              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  95+ AF75 3A 83 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  96+ AF78                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  96+ AF78 5F          >			ld	e,a
  96+ AF79 57          >			ld  d,a
  96+ AF7A ED 30       >			mul
  97+ AF7C 7A                                   ld		a,d
  98+ AF7D 32 53 9A                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  99+ AF80 7B                                   ld		a,e
 100+ AF81 32 52 9A                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
 101+ AF84 32 4F 99                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
 102+ AF87 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 103+ AF8A                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 103+ AF8A 5F          >			ld	e,a
 103+ AF8B 57          >			ld  d,a
 103+ AF8C ED 30       >			mul
 104+ AF8E 7A                                   ld		a,d
 105+ AF8F 32 6E 9A                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 106+ AF92 7B                                   ld		a,e
 107+ AF93 32 4F 99                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 108+ AF96 21 52 9A                             ld		hl,varQ
 109+ AF99 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 110+ AF9A 32 52 9A                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 111+ AF9D 3A 6E 9A                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 112+ AFA0 21 53 9A                             ld		hl,varR
 113+ AFA3 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 114+ AFA4 32 53 9A                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 115+ AFA7 3A 85 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 116+ AFAA                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 116+ AFAA 5F          >			ld	e,a
 116+ AFAB 57          >			ld  d,a
 116+ AFAC ED 30       >			mul
 117+ AFAE 7A                                   ld		a,d
 118+ AFAF 32 6E 9A                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 119+ AFB2 7B                                   ld		a,e
 120+ AFB3 32 4F 99                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 121+ AFB6 21 52 9A                             ld		hl,varQ
 122+ AFB9 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 123+ AFBA 32 52 9A                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 124+ AFBD 3A 6E 9A                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 125+ AFC0 21 53 9A                             ld		hl,varR
 126+ AFC3 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 127+ AFC4 32 53 9A                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 128+ AFC7 CD 52 AC                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 129+ AFCA 3A 83 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 130+ AFCD CD 63 B1                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 131+ AFD0 32 83 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 132+ AFD3 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 133+ AFD6 CD 63 B1                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 134+ AFD9 32 84 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 135+ AFDC 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 136+ AFDF CD 63 B1                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 137+ AFE2 32 84 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 138+ AFE5 C9                                   ret
 139+ AFE6
 140+ AFE6
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
1178  AFE6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ AFE6              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ AFE6              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ AFE6              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ AFE6              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ AFE6              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ AFE6              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ AFE6              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ AFE6 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ AFE9 CD FF AF     	call	Num1
  10+ AFEC 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ AFEF CD FF AF     	call	Num1
  12+ AFF2 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ AFF5 CD FF AF     	call	Num1
  14+ AFF8 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ AFFA CD FF AF     	call	Num1
  16+ AFFD 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ AFFF              Num1:
  18+ AFFF 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ B001              .Num2:
  20+ B001 3C           	inc	a
  21+ B002 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ B003 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ B005 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ B007 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ B008 13           	inc	de
  26+ B009 C9           	ret
  27+ B00A
  28+ B00A              DispAtoDE:
  29+ B00A 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ B00C 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ B00D C3 E6 AF     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ B010
  33+ B010              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ B010 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ B012 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ B013 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ B016 CD 26 B0     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ B019 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ B01B CD FF AF     	call	Num1
  40+ B01E 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ B020 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ B021 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ B022 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ B024 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ B026              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ B026 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ B028              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ B028 3C           	inc	a
  49+ B029 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ B02A 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ B02C FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ B02E 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ B030              .Blank:
  54+ B030 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ B032              .DontBlank:
  56+ B032 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ B034 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ B035 13           	inc	de
  59+ B036 C9           	ret
  60+ B037
  61+ B037              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ B037 FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ B039 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ B03B 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ B03D 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ B03E 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ B041 CD 4D B0     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ B044 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ B046 CD 4D B0     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ B049 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ B04B 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ B04D              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ B04D 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ B04F              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ B04F 3C           	inc	a
  76+ B050 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ B051 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ B053 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ B055 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ B057              .Blank:
  81+ B057 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ B059              .DontBlank:
  83+ B059 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ B05B 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ B05C 13           	inc	de
  86+ B05D C9           	ret
  87+ B05E              .NoStock:
  88+ B05E 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ B060 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ B061 13           	inc	de
  91+ B062 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ B063 13           	inc	de
  93+ B064 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ B066 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ B067 13           	inc de
  96+ B068 C9           	ret
  97+ B069
  98+ B069
  99+ B069              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ B069              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ B069              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ B069              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ B069 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ B06D 0A 00 00 00
 103+ B071 64 00 00 00
 103+ B075 E8 03 00 00
 103+ B079 10 27 00 00
 104+ B07D A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ B081 40 42 0F 00
 104+ B085 80 96 98 00
 104+ B089 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ B08D 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ B091 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ B095
 107+ B095              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ B095 CD A4 B0     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ B098 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ B09B FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ B09E 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ B0A0 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ B0A3 C9                                   ret
 114+ B0A4
 115+ B0A4 DD 22 91 B0  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ B0A8 ED 53 93 B0                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ B0AC DD 21 8D B0                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ B0B0 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ B0B2 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ B0B4 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ B0B6 B7                                   or a
 122+ B0B7 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ B0BA DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ B0BD 2A 91 B0                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ B0C0 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ B0C2 22 91 B0                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ B0C5 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ B0C8 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ B0CB 2A 93 B0                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ B0CE ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ B0D0 22 93 B0                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ B0D3 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ B0D5 0C                                   inc c
 134+ B0D6 3C                                   inc a
 135+ B0D7 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ B0D9 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ B0DC DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ B0DF 2A 91 B0                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ B0E2 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ B0E3 22 91 B0                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ B0E6 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ B0E9 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ B0EC 2A 93 B0                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ B0EF ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ B0F1 22 93 B0                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ B0F4 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ B0F7 DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ B0F9 0C                                   inc c
 149+ B0FA 0D                                   dec c
 150+ B0FB 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ B0FD FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ B100 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ B102 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ B104 3A 91 B0                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ B107 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ B109 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ B10C FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ B110 C9                                   ret
 159+ B111
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
1179  B111                  include "./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
   1+ B111              ;; calcs HLB + DEC where B and C are signs
   2+ B111              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ B111              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ B111 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
   5+ B112 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6+ B114 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ B115                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
   7+ B115 FA 23 B1    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
   8+ B118 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
   9+ B119 B1                                   or      c
  10+ B11A                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg        ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ B11A FA 1F B1    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  11+ B11D 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  12+ B11E C9                                   ret
  13+ B11F 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  14+ B120 78                                   ld      a,b
  15+ B121 B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  16+ B122 C9                                   ret
  17+ B123 B7           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       or      a
  18+ B124 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  19+ B126 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  20+ B128 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry: ld      a,b                                               ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  21+ B129 C9                                   ret
  22+ B12A              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                         ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  22+ B12A AF          >                    xor a
  22+ B12B 95          >                    sub l
  22+ B12C 6F          >                    ld l,a
  22+ B12D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  22+ B12E 94          >                    sub h
  22+ B12F 67          >                    ld h,a
  23+ B130 78                                   ld      a,b
  24+ B131 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  25+ B133 C9                                   ret
  26+ B134
# file closed: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
1180  B134              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
1181  B134              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
1182  B134                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ B134              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ B134 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ B135 D2 50 B1    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ B138 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ B13A CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ B13C                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ B13C BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ B13D DA 53 B1    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ B140 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ B141 37                                   scf
   7+ B142 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ B144 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ B146 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ B147 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ B149 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ B14B 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ B14C CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ B14E 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ B14F C9                                   ret
  16+ B150 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ B152 C9                                   ret
  18+ B153 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ B154 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ B156 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ B158 C3 46 B1                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ B15B
  23+ B15B
  24+ B15B              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ B15B              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ B15B              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ B15B CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ B15D 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ B15F ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ B161 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ B163              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ B163              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ B163              TIS2:
  34+ B163 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ B164 3A 52 9A     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ B167 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ B168 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ B169              AequAdivDmul96:
  39+ B169 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  40+ B16A E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  41+ B16C              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  41+ B16C BA          >                        cp     d
  41+ B16D D2 8D B1    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  42+ B170 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  43+ B172              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  44+ B172 CB 27        	sla			a
  45+ B174              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  45+ B174 BA          >                        cp      d
  45+ B175 DA 93 B1    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  46+ B178 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  47+ B179 37           	scf
  48+ B17A CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ B17C 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ B17E              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  51+ B17E 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  52+ B17F CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  53+ B181 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  54+ B183 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  55+ B184 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  56+ B186 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  57+ B187 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  58+ B188 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  59+ B189 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  60+ B18B B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  61+ B18C C9           	ret
  62+ B18D              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  63+ B18D              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  64+ B18D 79           	ld			a,c
  65+ B18E E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  66+ B190 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  67+ B192 C9           	ret
  68+ B193              .TIS2SkipSub:
  69+ B193 B7           	or			a
  70+ B194 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  71+ B196 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  72+ B198 C3 7E B1     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  73+ B19B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1183  B19B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ B19B              fmltu:
   2+ B19B              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ B19B              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ B19B 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ B19C 3A 52 9A     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ B19F 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ B1A0 ED 30        	mul
   8+ B1A2 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ B1A3 C9           	ret
  10+ B1A4
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
1184  B1A4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ B1A4              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ B1A4              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ B1A4 21 32 9D     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ B1A7 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ B1A9 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ B1AB 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ B1AC C3 B8 B1     		jp		DV41
   8+ B1AF              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ B1AF 21 32 9D     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ B1B2 3A 3D 99     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ B1B5 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ B1B7 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ B1B8              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ B1B8 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ B1B9 3A 4E 9A     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ B1BC              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ B1BC 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ B1BE CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ B1C0 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ B1C1 AF           		xor		a
  21+ B1C2              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ B1C2 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ B1C4 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ B1C6 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ B1C7 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ B1C9              DV8:
  27+ B1C9 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ B1CA 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ B1CB              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ B1CB CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ B1CD 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ B1CF              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ B1CF              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ B1CF 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ B1D1 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ B1D2              .RollRemainder:
  37+ B1D2 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ B1D4 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ B1D6 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ B1D7 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ B1D9              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ B1D9 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ B1DA              .DontSBC:
  44+ B1DA CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ B1DC 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ B1DE 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ B1DF 32 53 9A     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ B1E2 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ B1E3 32 4F 99     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ B1E6 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ B1E7              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ B1E7 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ B1E8 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ B1E9 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ B1EB 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ B1ED 79           		ld		a,c
