  57+ B1EE 32 53 9A     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ B1F1 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ B1F2 32 4F 99     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ B1F5 C9           		ret
  61+ B1F6              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ B1F6 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ B1F8 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ B1F9 32 53 9A     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ B1FC 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ B1FD 32 4F 99     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ B200 C9           		ret
  68+ B201
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
1185  B201                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ B201
   2+ B201              asm_defmutl:
   3+ B201              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ B201              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ B201 ED 30        	mul
   6+ B203 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ B204 C9           	ret
   8+ B205
   9+ B205
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
1186  B205              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
1187  B205              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
1188  B205              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
1189  B205                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ B205              APequQmulA:
   2+ B205              asm_mult1:
   3+ B205              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ B205 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ B207 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ B209 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ B20A 3A 52 9A     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ B20D 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ B20E FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ B210 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ B212 AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ B213 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ B215 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ B216 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ B217 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ B219 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ B21A 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ B21B E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ B21D 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ B21E ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ B220 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ B221 32 4F 99     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ B224 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ B225 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ B226 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ B227 C9           	ret
  27+ B228              .mul0:
  28+ B228 AF           	xor	a
  29+ B229 32 4F 99     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ B22C 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ B22D 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ B22E C9           	ret
  33+ B22F
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1190  B22F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ B22F              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ B22F              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ B22F              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ B22F              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ B22F              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ B22F              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ B22F              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ B22F              LL38:
   9+ B22F              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ B22F              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ B22F              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ B22F              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ B22F              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ B22F              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ B22F              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ B22F              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ B22F              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ B22F              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ B22F              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ B22F              ;	ret
  21+ B22F              ; calculation table
  22+ B22F              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ B22F              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ B22F              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ B22F              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ B22F              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ B22F              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ B22F              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ B22F              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ B22F              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ B22F
  32+ B22F              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ B22F              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ B22F              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ B22F              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ B22F
  37+ B22F
  38+ B22F              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ B22F 21 54 9A     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ B232 AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ B233 FA 3E B2     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ B236 3A 52 9A     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ B239 21 53 9A     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ B23C 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ B23D C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ B23E              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ B23E 3A 53 9A     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ B241 21 52 9A     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ B244              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ B244              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ B244 B7          >                        or a
  51+ B245 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ B246 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ B248              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ B248              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ B248              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ B248 C9           	ret
  57+ B249              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ B249 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ B24B 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ B24D ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ B24F 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ B250 3A 54 9A     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ B253 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ B255 32 54 9A     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ B258 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ B259                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ B259 B7          >                        or a
  67+ B25A C9           	ret
  68+ B25B              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ B25B 32 54 9A         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ B25E                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ B25E B7          >                        or a
  71+ B25F C9               ret
  72+ B260              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ B260              ;--	push	bc
  74+ B260              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ B260              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ B260              ;--	sub		b
  77+ B260              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ B260              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ B260              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ B260              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ B260              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ B260              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ B260              ;--	ret
  84+ B260
  85+ B260              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ B260              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ B260              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ B260              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ B260              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ B260              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ B260              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ B260              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ B260              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ B260              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ B260              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ B260              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ B260              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ B260              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ B260              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ B260              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ B260              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ B260              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ B260              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ B260              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ B260              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ B260              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ B260              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ B260              ;;;;	ret
 109+ B260              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ B260              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ B260              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ B260              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ B260              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ B260              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ B260              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ B260              ;;;;	ret
 117+ B260              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ B260              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ B260              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ B260              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ B260              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ B260              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ B260              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ B260              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ B260              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ B260              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ B260              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ B260              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ B260              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ B260              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ B260              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ B260              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ B260              ;;;;	ret
 134+ B260              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ B260              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ B260              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ B260              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ B260              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ B260              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ B260              ;;;;	ret
 141+ B260
 142+ B260
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
1191  B260                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ B260              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ B260              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ B260              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ B260
   5+ B260
   6+ B260              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ B260 3A 3D 99     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ B263 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ B264              moveship4breg:
  10+ B264              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ B264              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ B264              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ B264 3A 68 99     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ B267 32 52 9A     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ B26A 21 0E C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ B26D 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ B26E ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ B270 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ B271 32 53 9A     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ B274 23           		inc		hl
  21+ B275 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ B276 32 54 9A     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ B279 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ B27A 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ B27B 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ B27C 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y
  27+ B27D 32 4F 99     		ld		(varP),a					; P  \ over-written	 P = nosevx lo
  28+ B280 23           		inc		hl
  29+ B281 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ B282 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ B284 CD DA AA     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ B287 23                   inc     hl
  33+ B288 23                   inc     hl
  34+ B289 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  35+ B28A 2B                   dec     hl
  36+ B28B 3A 3C 99             ld      a,(regX)
  37+ B28E 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ B28F 32 4F 99             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ B292 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ B293 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ B294 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ B295 32 53 9A             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ B298 23                   inc     hl
  44+ B299 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y
  45+ B29A 32 54 9A             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  46+ B29D 23                   inc     hl
  47+ B29E 23                   inc     hl
  48+ B29F 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ B2A0 CD DA AA             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ B2A3 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ B2A4 2B                   dec     hl
  52+ B2A5 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+1,Y  \ hi
  53+ B2A6 3A 3C 99             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ B2A9 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ B2AA 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ B2AB 32 4F 99             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ B2AE 3A 5A 99             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ B2B1 32 52 9A             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ B2B4 23                   inc     hl
  60+ B2B5 23                   inc     hl
  61+ B2B6 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ B2B7 32 53 9A             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ B2BA 23                   inc     hl
  64+ B2BB 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ B2BC 32 54 9A             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ B2BF 23                   inc     hl
  67+ B2C0 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ B2C1 32 4F 99             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ B2C4 23                   inc     hl
  70+ B2C5 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ B2C6 EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ B2C8 CD DA AA             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ B2CB 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ B2CC 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ B2CD 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ B2CE 3A 3C 99             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ B2D1 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ B2D2 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ B2D3 32 4F 99             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  80+ B2D6 23                   inc     hl
  81+ B2D7 23                   inc     hl
  82+ B2D8 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  83+ B2D9 32 53 9A             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  84+ B2DC 23                   inc     hl
  85+ B2DD 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  86+ B2DE 32 54 9A             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  87+ B2E1 2B                   dec     hl
  88+ B2E2 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ B2E3 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  90+ B2E4 CD DA AA             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = beta*INWK+3,Y + INWK+4,5,Y
  91+ B2E7 23                   inc     hl
  92+ B2E8 23                   inc     hl
  93+ B2E9 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+5,Y \ hi
  94+ B2EA 3A 3C 99             ld      a,(regX)
  95+ B2ED 2B                   dec     hl
  96+ B2EE 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+4,Y \ Z=Z+bY   \ their comment
  97+ B2EF C9                   ret
  98+ B2F0
  99+ B2F0
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
1192  B2F0              ;INCLUDE "MoveShip5-MVS5.asm"
1193  B2F0              ;INCLUDE "PAequAmulQusgn-MLU2.asm"
1194  B2F0              ;INCLUDE "PAequDustYIdxYmulQ-MLU1.asm"
1195  B2F0              ;INCLUDE "PlanetP12addInwkX-MVT6.asm"
1196  B2F0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ B2F0              ;;;LL28:
   2+ B2F0              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ B2F0              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ B2F0              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ B2F0              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ B2F0              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ B2F0              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ B2F0              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ B2F0              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ B2F0              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ B2F0              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ B2F0              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ B2F0              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ B2F0              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ B2F0              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ B2F0              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ B2F0              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ B2F0              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ B2F0              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ B2F0              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ B2F0              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ B2F0              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ B2F0              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ B2F0              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ B2F0              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ B2F0              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ B2F0              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ B2F0              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ B2F0              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ B2F0              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ B2F0              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ B2F0              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ B2F0              ;;;	ret
  34+ B2F0              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ B2F0              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ B2F0              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ B2F0              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ B2F0              ;;;	ret
  39+ B2F0
  40+ B2F0              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ B2F0 59             ld    e,c
  42+ B2F1 67             ld    h,a
  43+ B2F2 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ B2F4              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ B2F4 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ B2F5 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ B2F6 C8             ret z
  48+ B2F7 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ B2FA 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ B2FC              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ B2FC ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ B2FE 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ B2FF 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ B301 C9             ret
  55+ B302
  56+ B302              HL_Div_C:
  57+ B302              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ B302              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ B302              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ B302 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ B304 AF                   xor a
  62+ B305              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ B305 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ B306 17                   rla
  65+ B307 B9                   cp c
  66+ B308 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ B30A 91                   sub c
  68+ B30B 2C                   inc l
  69+ B30C              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ B30C 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ B30E 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ B30F 32 53 9A             ld  (varR),a
  73+ B312 C9                   ret
  74+ B313
  75+ B313
  76+ B313
  77+ B313              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ B313              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ B313              BFRDIV:
  80+ B313 F5           		push	af
  81+ B314 3A 52 9A     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ B317 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ B318 F1           		pop		af
  84+ B319 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ B31B CA 32 B3     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ B31E              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ B31E 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ B320 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ B321              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ B321 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ B323 AF           		xor a
  92+ B324              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ B324 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ B325 17           		rla
  95+ B326 B9           		cp c
  96+ B327 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ B329 2C           		inc l
  98+ B32A 91           		sub c
  99+ B32B              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ B32B 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ B32D 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ B32E 32 53 9A     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ B331 C9           		ret
 104+ B332              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ B332 32 53 9A     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ B335 C9           		ret
 107+ B336              ;	push	af
 108+ B336              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ B336              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ B336              ;	pop		af
 111+ B336              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ B336              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ B336              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ B336              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ B336              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ B336              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ B336              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ B336              ;	sla		a
 119+ B336              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ B336              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ B336              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ B336              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ B336              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ B336              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ B336              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ B336              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ B336              ;	scf
 128+ B336              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ B336              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ B336              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ B336              ;LL2:
 132+ B336              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ B336              ;LL2Good:
 134+ B336              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ B336              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ B336              ;	ret
 137+ B336
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
1197  B336                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ B336              RequAdivQ:
   2+ B336              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ B336              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ B336 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ B337 3A 52 9A     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ B33A FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ B33C 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ B33E 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ B33F 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ B341 AF               xor a
  11+ B342              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ B342 CB 21            sla c
  13+ B344 17               rla
  14+ B345 BA               cp d
  15+ B346 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ B348 0C               inc c
  17+ B349 92               sub d
  18+ B34A              LL64:
  19+ B34A 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ B34C 32 51 9A     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ B34F 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ B350 32 53 9A     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ B353 C9               ret
  24+ B354              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ B354 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ B356 32 53 9A     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ B359 32 51 9A     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ B35C C9           	ret
  29+ B35D
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

  32+ B3DD
  33+ B3DD              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ B3DD              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ B3DD              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ B3DD 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ B3DE 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ B3DF 32 52 9A     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ B3E2 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ B3E3 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ B3E5 CD DA AA     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ B3E8              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ B3E8              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ B3E8              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ B3E8 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ B3E9 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ B3EB 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ B3EC 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ B3ED E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ B3EF 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ B3F1              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ B3F1 CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ B3F3              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ B3F3 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ B3F5 DA 02 B4    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ B3F8 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ B3FA 37           		scf
  56+ B3FB CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ B3FD 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ B3FF              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ B3FF 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ B400 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ B401 C9           		ret
  62+ B402              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ B402 B7           	or			a
  64+ B403 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ B405 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ B407 C3 FF B3     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ B40A
  68+ B40A              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ B40A              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ B40A
  71+ B40A
  72+ B40A
  73+ B40A
  74+ B40A              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ B40A CD 35 B5     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ B40D 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ B410 C3 46 B4     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ B413
  79+ B413              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ B413 AF           		xor		a
  81+ B414 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ B415 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ B418 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ B41A CA 0A B4     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ B41D 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ B420 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ B421 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ B424 CD FB B4     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ B427 32 1E C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ B42A C3 46 B4     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ B42D              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ B42D              TIDY:
  93+ B42D DD 01                break
  94+ B42F              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ B42F              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ B42F CD 6B B3     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ B432 CD 12 AF     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ B435 CD A4 B3     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ B438              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ B438 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ B43B E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ B43D CA 13 B4     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ B440              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ B440 CD C1 B4             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ B443 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ B446              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ B446 CD 7E B3     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ B449 CD 12 AF     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ B44C              ;calc sidev x
 110+ B44C CD B7 B3     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ B44F 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ B452 32 52 9A     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ B455 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ B458 CD 5D B3     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ B45B 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ B45E 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ B45F 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ B462 CD DD B3     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ B465                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ B465 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ B466 CA 6B B4    >                        jp	z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ B469 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ B46B              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ B46B 32 16 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ B46E              ;calc sidev y
 124+ B46E 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ B471 32 52 9A     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ B474 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ B477 CD 5D B3     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ B47A 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ B47D 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ B47E 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ B481 CD DD B3     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ B484                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ B484 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ B485 CA 8A B4    >                        jp	z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ B488 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ B48A              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ B48A 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ B48D              ;calc sidev z
 137+ B48D 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ B490 32 52 9A     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ B493 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ B496 CD 5D B3     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ B499 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ B49C 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ B49D 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ B4A0 CD DD B3     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ B4A3                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ B4A3 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ B4A4 CA A9 B4    >                        jp	z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ B4A7 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ B4A9              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ B4A9 32 18 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ B4AC              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ B4AC 21 21 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ B4AF 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ B4B1 AF                   xor     a
 153+ B4B2              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ B4B2 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ B4B3 23           		inc		hl
 156+ B4B4 23           		inc		hl
 157+ B4B5 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ B4B7 CD 91 B3     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ B4BA CD 12 AF     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ B4BD              ;calc sidev x
 161+ B4BD CD CA B3     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ B4C0
 163+ B4C0 C9           		ret
 164+ B4C1
 165+ B4C1
 166+ B4C1
 167+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ B4C1              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ B4C1
 239+ B4C1
 240+ B4C1              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ B4C1              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 242+ B4C1              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ B4C1 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ B4C4 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 243+ B4C7 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ B4CA CD 5D B3     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ B4CD              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ B4CD 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ B4D0 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 246+ B4D3 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ B4D6 CD DA AA     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ B4D9 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ B4DA E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ B4DC FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ B4DE              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ B4DE 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ B4E1 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ B4E2 E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ B4E4 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ B4E6 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ B4E8 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ B4E9 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ B4EB 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ B4EC 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 261+ B4ED 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ B4EE 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ B4F0 CD 84 AD     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ B4F3 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ B4F5 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ B4F7 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ B4F9 B0           		or		b
 268+ B4FA C9           		ret
 269+ B4FB
 270+ B4FB
 271+ B4FB              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ B4FB              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 273+ B4FB              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ B4FB 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ B4FE 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 274+ B501 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ B504 CD 5D B3     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ B507              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ B507 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ B50A 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 277+ B50D 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ B510 CD DA AA     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ B513 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ B514 E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ B516 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ B518 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ B51B 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ B51C E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ B51E FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ B520 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ B522 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ B523 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ B525 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ B526 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 291+ B527 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ B528 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ B52A CD 84 AD     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ B52D FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ B52F EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ B531 E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ B533 B0           		or		b
 298+ B534 C9           		ret
 299+ B535
 300+ B535              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ B535              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 302+ B535              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ B535 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ B538 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 303+ B53B 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ B53E CD 5D B3     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ B541              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ B541 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ B544 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 306+ B547 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ B54A CD DA AA     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ B54D 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ B54E E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ B550 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ B552 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ B555 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ B556 E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ B558 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ B55A FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ B55C 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ B55D E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ B55F 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ B560 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 320+ B561 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ B562 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ B564 CD 84 AD     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ B567 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ B569 EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ B56B E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ B56D B0           		or		b
 327+ B56E C9           		ret
 328+ B56F
 329+ B56F
 330+ B56F
 331+ B56F              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ B56F              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ B56F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ B56F              ;;		push	bc
 335+ B56F              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ B56F              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ B56F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ B56F              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ B56F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ B56F              ;;		push	bc
 341+ B56F              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ B56F              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ B56F              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ B56F              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ B56F              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ B56F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ B56F              ;;		push	bc
 348+ B56F              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ B56F              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ B56F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ B56F              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ B56F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ B56F              ;;		push	bc
 354+ B56F              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ B56F              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ B56F              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ B56F              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ B56F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ B56F              ;;		push	bc
 360+ B56F              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ B56F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ B56F              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ B56F              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ B56F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ B56F              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ B56F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ B56F              ;;		push	bc
 368+ B56F              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ B56F              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ B56F              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ B56F              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ B56F              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ B56F              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ B56F              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ B56F              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ B56F
 377+ B56F
 378+ B56F
 379+ B56F
 380+ B56F
 381+ B56F
 382+ B56F              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ B56F              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ B56F              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ B56F              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 386+ B56F              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof

 388+ B56F              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 389+ B56F              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:

 391+ B56F              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 392+ B56F              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 393+ B56F              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 394+ B56F              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 395+ B56F
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
1202  B56F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ B56F
   2+ B56F              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ B56F BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ B570 D2 8E B5    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ B573 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ B575 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ B577 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ B579                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ B579 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ B57A DA 7F B5    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ B57D 92                                   sub     d
   8+ B57E                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ B57E B7          >                        or a
   9+ B57F 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ B580 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ B582 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ B584 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ B585 C9                                   ret
  14+ B586 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ B587 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ B588 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ B58A 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ B58C 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ B58D C9                                   ret
  20+ B58E 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ B590 C9                                   ret
  22+ B591
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
1203  B591                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ B591              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ B591              TIS1:
   3+ B591 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ B592 3A 3C 99     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ B595 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ B596 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ B597              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ B597 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ B598 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ B599 32 52 9A     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ B59C 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ B59D EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ B59F CD DA AA     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ B5A2              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ B5A2              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ B5A2              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ B5A2 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ B5A3 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ B5A5 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ B5A6 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ B5A7 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ B5A9 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ B5AB 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ B5AC              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ B5AC CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ B5AE FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ B5B0 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ B5B2 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ B5B4              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ B5B4 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ B5B6 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ B5B8 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ B5B9 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ B5BA C9           		ret
  35+ B5BB
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

   1+ B5BB              ;Ship Tactics
   2+ B5BB              ; used  when no pre-checks are requrired, e.g. if forcing a space station from main loop
   3+ B5BB
   4+ B5BB
   5+ B5BB              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
   6+ B5BB 3A 23 C3     MakeAngry:              ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
   7+ B5BE                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbAngry
   7+ B5BE 3A 22 C3    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
   7+ B5C1 FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
   7+ B5C3 CA E6 B5    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbAngry
   8+ B5C6 E6 20        .ItsNotAStation:        and     ShipIsBystander                         ; check if space station present if its a bystander
   9+ B5C8 C4 EC B5                             call    nz, SetStationAngry                     ; Set Space Station if present, Angry
  10+ B5CB 3A 37 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data
  11+ B5CE                                      ReturnIfAIsZero                                 ; if 0 then no AI attached
  11+ B5CE A7          >                        and     a
  11+ B5CF C8          >                        ret     z
  12+ B5D0 F6 80                                or      ShipAIEnabled                           ; set AI Enabled set to ensure its set
  13+ B5D2 32 37 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                        ; .
  14+ B5D5 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
  15+ B5D6                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
  15+ B5D6 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
  15+ B5D8 32 32 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
  16+ B5DB CB 27                                sla     a                                       ; set pitch to 4

  28+ B5EF D8                                   ret     c

  30+ B5F3 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a

  37+ B604              CheckMissileBlastInit:  ZeroA
  37+ B604 AF          >                        xor a

  39+ B608 21 0C C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo                      ; Copy Blast Coordinates
  40+ B60B 01 0C 00                             ld      bc,12                           ; and Damage stats
  41+ B60E 11 EF 9A                             ld      de,MissileXPos
  42+ B611 ED B0                                ldir

  43+ B613 AF          >                        xor a

  48+ B61E
  49+ B61E              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
  50+ B61E ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
  51+ B61E ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
  52+ B61E ~                                    xor     (hl)
  53+ B61E ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  54+ B61E ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
  55+ B61E ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
  56+ B61E ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
  57+ B61E ~            .XSame:                 and     a
  58+ B61E ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
  59+ B61E ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
  60+ B61E ~                                    NegHL
  61+ B61E ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
  62+ B61E ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
  63+ B61E ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
  64+ B61E ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
  65+ B61E ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
  66+ B61E ~                                    ld      a,l
  67+ B61E ~                                    and     a
  68+ B61E ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
  69+ B61E                                      ENDM
  70+ B61E              ;...................................................................
  71+ B61E              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
  72+ B61E 3A 21 9B     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
  73+ B621                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
  73+ B621 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
  73+ B623 D0          >                        ret	 nc
  74+ B624 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
  75+ B626 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks
  76+ B627 32 21 9B                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
  77+ B62A                                      ReturnIfSlotAEmpty
  77+ B62A 21 23 9B    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  77+ B62D ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
  77+ B62F 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  77+ B630 3C          >                        inc     a
  77+ B631 C8          >                        ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
  77+ B632 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
  78+ B633 CD F4 9E                             call    IsSpaceStationPresent               ; If its a station its imune to missiles

  86+ B646 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a

   1+ B76F              M_GETSETDRV             equ $89
   2+ B76F              F_OPEN                  equ $9a
   3+ B76F              F_CLOSE                 equ $9b
   4+ B76F              F_READ                  equ $9d
   5+ B76F              F_WRITE                 equ $9e
   6+ B76F              F_SEEK                  equ $9f
   7+ B76F
   8+ B76F              FA_READ                 equ $01
   9+ B76F              FA_APPEND               equ $06
  10+ B76F              FA_OVERWRITE            equ $0C
  11+ B76F
  12+ B76F              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  13+ B76F              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  14+ B76F F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  14+ B773 DD E5
  15+ B775 AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  16+ B776 CF                                   rst	    $08
  17+ B777 89                                   db	    $89
  18+ B778 32 82 B7                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  19+ B77B DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  19+ B77F C1 F1
  20+ B781 C9                                   ret
  21+ B782 00           DefaultDrive:	        db	0
  22+ B783
  23+ B783              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  24+ B783              ;	Function:	Open a file read for reading/writing
  25+ B783              ;	In:		ix = filename
  26+ B783              ;			b  = Open filemode
  27+ B783              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  28+ B783              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  29+ B783 E5           fOpen:	                push	hl
  30+ B784 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
  31+ B787 3A 82 B7                             ld	    a,(DefaultDrive)
  32+ B78A CF                                   rst	    $08
  33+ B78B 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  34+ B78C E1                                   pop	    hl
  35+ B78D C9                                   ret
  36+ B78E
  37+ B78E              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  38+ B78E              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  39+ B78E              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  40+ B78E              ;			bc  = amount to read
  41+ B78E              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  42+ B78E              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  43+ B78E B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
  44+ B78F C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  45+ B790 E5                                   push    hl
  46+ B791 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
  47+ B794 CF                                   rst	    $08
  48+ B795 9D                                   db	    F_READ
  49+ B796 E1                                   pop	    hl
  50+ B797 C9                                   ret
  51+ B798
  52+ B798              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  53+ B798              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  54+ B798              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  55+ B798              ;			bc  = amount to read
  56+ B798              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  57+ B798              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  58+ B798 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
  59+ B799 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  60+ B79A E5                                   push	hl
  61+ B79B DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
  62+ B79E CF                                   rst	    $08
  63+ B79F 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
  64+ B7A0 E1                                   pop	    hl
  65+ B7A1 C9                                   ret
  66+ B7A2
  67+ B7A2              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  68+ B7A2              ;	Function:	Close open file
  69+ B7A2              ;	In:		a  = handle
  70+ B7A2              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  71+ B7A2              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  72+ B7A2 B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
  73+ B7A3 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  74+ B7A4 CF                                   rst	    $08
  75+ B7A5 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
  76+ B7A6 C9                                   ret
  77+ B7A7
  78+ B7A7              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  79+ B7A7              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  80+ B7A7              ;	In:		a   = file handle
  81+ B7A7              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
  82+ B7A7              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
  83+ B7A7              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
  84+ B7A7              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  85+ B7A7 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
  86+ B7AA CF                                   rst	    $08
  87+ B7AB 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
  88+ B7AC E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
  89+ B7AF C9                                   ret
  90+ B7B0
  91+ B7B0              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  92+ B7B0              ; Init the file system
  93+ B7B0              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  94+ B7B0 CD 6F B7     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
  95+ B7B3 C9                                   ret
  96+ B7B4
  97+ B7B4              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  98+ B7B4              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
  99+ B7B4              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 100+ B7B4              ;		    ix = address to load to
 101+ B7B4              ;           bc = filelength
 102+ B7B4              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 103+ B7B4 CD 6F B7     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 104+ B7B7 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 105+ B7BA                                      ; get file size
 106+ B7BA C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 107+ B7BD E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 108+ B7C0 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 109+ B7C2 CD 83 B7                             call    fOpen
 110+ B7C5 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 111+ B7C7 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 112+ B7C9 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 113+ B7CB DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 114+ B7CE F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 115+ B7CF CD 8E B7                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 116+ B7D2 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 117+ B7D4 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 118+ B7D5 CD A2 B7                             call	fClose			; close file
 119+ B7D8 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 120+ B7DA F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 121+ B7DD C9                                   ret
 122+ B7DE              ;
 123+ B7DE              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 124+ B7DE              ;
 125+ B7DE DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 126+ B7E0 C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 127+ B7E1
 128+ B7E1              .error_closing:
 129+ B7E1 C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 130+ B7E2 D1                                   pop	de
 131+ B7E3 C1                                   pop	bc
 132+ B7E4 C9                                   ret
 133+ B7E5
 134+ B7E5              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 135+ B7E5              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 136+ B7E5              ; In:		hl = file name
 137+ B7E5              ;		    ix = address to save from
 138+ B7E5              ;		    bc = size
 139+ B7E5              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 140+ B7E5 CD 6F B7     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 141+ B7E8 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 142+ B7EB E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 143+ B7EE 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 144+ B7F0 CD 83 B7                             call    fOpen
 145+ B7F3 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 146+ B7F5 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 147+ B7F7 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 148+ B7F9 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 149+ B7FC F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 150+ B7FD CD 98 B7                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 151+ B800 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 152+ B802 F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 153+ B803 CD A2 B7                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 154+ B806 C9           .error:                 ret

 156+ B807              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it

  18+ B8B8
  19+ B8B8              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ B8B8              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ B8B8              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ B8B8 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ B8B9 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ B8BA 23           	inc			hl
  25+ B8BB 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ B8BC 23           	inc			hl
  27+ B8BD 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ B8BE 23           	inc			hl
  29+ B8BF 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ B8C0 23           	inc			hl
  31+ B8C1 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ B8C2 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ B8C3 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ B8C5                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ B8C5 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ B8C9 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ B8CC E1           	pop			hl
  37+ B8CD C1           	pop			bc
  38+ B8CE 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ B8D0 C9           	ret
  40+ B8D1
  41+ B8D1
  42+ B8D1              print_boiler_text:
  43+ B8D1              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ B8D1              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ B8D1 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ B8D2 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ B8D3 23           	inc			hl
  48+ B8D4 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ B8D5 23           	inc			hl
  50+ B8D6 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ B8D7 23           	inc			hl
  52+ B8D8 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ B8D9 23           	inc			hl
  54+ B8DA E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ B8DB EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ B8DC 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ B8DE C5           	push		bc
  58+ B8DF D1           	pop			de
  59+ B8E0 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  60+ B8E3 E1           	pop			hl
  61+ B8E4 C1           	pop			bc
  62+ B8E5 10 EA        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ B8E7 C9           	ret

   8++B8F5 CD FA B8     	call	.Num1
   9++B8F8 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  10++B8FA              .Num1:
  11++B8FA 06 2F        	ld	b,'0'-1
  12++B8FC              .Num2:
  13++B8FC 04           	inc		b
  14++B8FD 81           	add		a,c
  15++B8FE 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++B900 91           	sub 	c
  17++B901 C5           	push	bc
  18++B902 F5           	push	af
  19++B903 79           	ld		a,c
  20++B904 FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++B906 CC 0F B9     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++B909 78           	ld		a,b
  23++B90A 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++B90B 13           	inc		de
  25++B90C F1           	pop		af
  26++B90D C1           	pop		bc
  27++B90E C9           	ret
  28++B90F              .InsertDot:
  29++B90F 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'
  30++B911 12           	ld		(de),a
  31++B912 13           	inc		de
  32++B913 C9           	ret

  67+ B914 2A 28 9F     GetCash:                ld      hl,(Cash)
  68+ B917 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  69+ B918 DD 2A 2A 9F                          ld      ix,(Cash+2)
  70+ B91C FD 21 A7 B8                          ld		iy,txt_cash_amount
  71+ B920 CD A4 B0                             call 	DispDEIXtoIY	; This will write out with 0 termination after last digit
  72+ B923 FD 7E 00     .ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal
  73+ B926 32 B3 B8                             ld		(txt_cash_fraction),a
  74+ B929 21 A8 B8     .UpdateInteger:         ld		hl,txt_cash_amount+1	; Now was there only 1 digit
  75+ B92C 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)					; if so we leave it alone so its "0.0"
  76+ B92D FE 00                                cp		0
  77+ B92F C8                                   ret		z
  78+ B930 FD 36 00 00                          ld		(IY),0					; Else we erase last digit as it went to fraction
  79+ B934 C9                                   ret

  69+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  71+ C130 ED 4B 5C 9B                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  72+ C134 ED 5B 5A 9B                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  73+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  81+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  82+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  83+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  84+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  85+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  86+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  93+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  94+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  95+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  96+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  97+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
  98+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
  99+ C165 C6 60                                add		a,src_y_centre
 100+ C167 47                                   ld		b,a
 101+ C168              .RedrawSprite:          MMUSelectSpriteBank
