  36++D2B6 32 7F C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0zSgn),a
  37++D2B9                      ldCopyByte UBnkXScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0xLo   ; XX15+0 => XX18+0
  37++D2B9 3A 83 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
  37++D2BC 32 77 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a
  38++D2BF                      ldCopyByte UBnkXScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0xSgn  ; XX15+1 => XX18+2
  38++D2BF 3A 84 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
  38++D2C2 32 79 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0xSgn),a
  39++D2C5                      ldCopyByte UBnkYScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0yLo   ; XX15+2 => XX18+3
  39++D2C5 3A 85 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
  39++D2C8 32 7A C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a
  40++D2CB                      ldCopyByte UBnkYScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0ySgn  ; XX15+3 => XX18+5
  40++D2CB 3A 86 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
  40++D2CE 32 7C C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0ySgn),a
  41++D2D1                      ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0zLo   ; XX15+4 => XX18+6
  41++D2D1 3A 87 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
  41++D2D4 32 7D C0    >                        ld       (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a
  42++D2D7 C9                   ret
  43++D2D8
  44++D2D8
  45++D2D8              XX15EquXX15AddXX18:
  46++D2D8              LL94Z:
  47++D2D8 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  48++D2DA 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  49++D2DC 3A 87 C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                                         ;
  50++D2DF 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  51++D2E0 3A 88 C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)                                     ;
  52++D2E3 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  53++D2E4 3A 7D C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)                                     ;
  54++D2E7 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  55++D2E8 3A 7F C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)                                    ;
  56++D2EB 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  57++D2EC CD 11 B1             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  58++D2EF 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  59++D2F0 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  60++D2F1 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  61++D2F2 32 88 C0             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a                                     ;
  62++D2F5 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  63++D2F6 32 87 C0             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  64++D2F9              LL94X:
  65++D2F9 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  66++D2FB 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  67++D2FD 3A 83 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                                         ;
  68++D300 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  69++D301 3A 84 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                                     ;
  70++D304 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  71++D305 3A 77 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)                                     ;
  72++D308 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  73++D309 3A 79 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)                                    ;
  74++D30C 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  75++D30D CD 11 B1             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  76++D310 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  77++D311 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  78++D312 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  79++D313 32 84 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a                                     ;
  80++D316 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  81++D317 32 83 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  82++D31A              LL94Y:
  83++D31A 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  84++D31C 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  85++D31E 3A 85 C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                                         ;
  86++D321 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  87++D322 3A 86 C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                                     ;
  88++D325 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  89++D326 3A 7A C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)                                     ;
  90++D329 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  91++D32A 3A 7C C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)                                    ;
  92++D32D 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  93++D32E CD 11 B1             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  94++D331 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  95++D332 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  96++D333 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  97++D334 32 86 C0             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a                                     ;
  98++D337 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  99++D338 32 85 C0             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                         ;
 100++D33B C9                   ret
 101++D33C
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX18ScaledToXX15.asm
 789+ D33C                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++D33C              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D33C              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++D33C                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++D33C 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D33F 32 83 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D342                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D342 3A 8B C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D345 32 85 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++D348                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++D348 3A 8D C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++D34B 32 87 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++D34E C9                   ret
   7++D34F
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
 790+ D34F              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 791+ D34F                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D34F              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D34F              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D34F              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D34F              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D34F              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D34F              ;;; R = T
   7++D34F              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D34F              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D34F              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D34F              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D34F              ;;; R = T
  12++D34F              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D34F
  14++D34F
  15++D34F
  16++D34F
  17++D34F
  18++D34F              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D34F ~            						mul
  20++D34F ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D34F              						ENDM
  22++D34F              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D34F 3A 89 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D352                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D352 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D353 CA 70 D3    >                        jp	z, dotxskipzero
  25++D356 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D357 3A 83 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D35A 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D35B                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D35B A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D35C CA 70 D3    >                        jp	z, dotxskipzero
  29++D35F ED 30        		mul
  30++D361 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D362 3A 8A C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D365 21 84 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D368 AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D369 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D36B FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D36D C3 74 D3             jp          dotmuly
  37++D370              dotxskipzero:
  38++D370 AF                   xor         a
  39++D371 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D372 FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D374              dotmuly:
  42++D374              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D374 3A 8B C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D377                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D377 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D378 CA 97 D3    >                        jp	z, dotyskipzero
  45++D37B 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D37C 3A 85 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D37F                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D37F A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D380 CA 97 D3    >                        jp	z, dotyskipzero
  48++D383 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D384 ED 30                mul
  50++D386 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D387 DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D389 3A 8C C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D38C 21 86 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D38F AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D390 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D392 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D394 C3 9B D3             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D397              dotyskipzero:
  59++D397 AF                   xor         a
  60++D398 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D399 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D39B              dotaddxy:
  63++D39B              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D39B 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D39D 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D39E 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D3A0 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D3A1 FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D3A3 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D3A4 CD 11 B1             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D3A7 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D3A8 3A 8D C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D3AB                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D3AB A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D3AC CA D1 D3    >                        jp	z, dotzskipzero
  74++D3AF 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D3B0 3A 87 C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D3B3                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D3B3 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D3B4 CA D1 D3    >                        jp	z, dotzskipzero
  77++D3B7 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D3B8 ED 30                mul
  79++D3BA E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D3BB 3A 88 C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D3BE 21 8E C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D3C1 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D3C2 E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D3C4 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D3C5 E1                   pop         hl
  86++D3C6 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D3C7 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D3C9 CD 11 B1             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D3CC 32 54 9A             ld          (varS),a
  90++D3CF 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D3D0 C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D3D1              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D3D1 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D3D2 32 54 9A             ld          (varS),a
  95++D3D5 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D3D6 C9                   ret
  97++D3D7              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D3D7              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D3D7              ;;;;		mul
 104++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D3D7              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D3D7              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D3D7              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D3D7              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D3D7              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D3D7              ;;;;       mul
 117++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D3D7              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D3D7              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D3D7              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D3D7              ;;;;       mul
 132++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D3D7              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D3D7              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D3D7              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D3D7              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D3D7              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D3D7              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D3D7
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 792+ D3D7              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 793+ D3D7              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 794+ D3D7                                      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
   1++D3D7              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
   2++D3D7              ; returns with XX15 scaled by Q but also z scaled in a register
   3++D3D7              ScaleNormal:
   4++D3D7              LL93:
   5++D3D7 3A 59 9A             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; scale--
   6++D3DA DD 6F        		ld		ixl,a
   7++D3DC 3A 87 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkZScaled)				; needs to be in a just in case we abort early
   8++D3DF DD 2D        		dec		ixl
   9++D3E1 F8           		ret		m							; return if q was 0, i.e. no scaling
  10++D3E2              ScaleLoop:
  11++D3E2              LL933:
  12++D3E2 21 83 C0             ld      hl,XX15
  13++D3E5 CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15	\ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
  14++D3E7 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 x sign now
  15++D3E8 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 y Lo now
  16++D3E9 CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2	\ ynormal lo/2
  17++D3EB 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 y sign now
  18++D3EC 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 z Lo now
  19++D3ED CB 3E        		srl		(hl)
  20++D3EF 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; znormal lo/2 also into a it came in at the end of LL92
  21++D3F0 DD 2D                dec     ixl                         ; reduce scale
  22++D3F2 F2 E2 D3             jp      p,ScaleLoop                 ; LL93-3 loop to lsr xx15
  23++D3F5 C9                   ret
  24++D3F6
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm
 795+ D3F6              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 796+ D3F6                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D3F6              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D3F6              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D3F6 3A 1E C3             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D3F9 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D3FA              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D3FA 3A 7E C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D3FD 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D3FE                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D3FE A7          >                        and     a
   8++D3FF C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D400              LL90Loop:
  10++D400              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D400 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D401                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D401 2A 7A C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D404 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D406 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D408 22 7A C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D40B                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D40B 2A 77 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D40E CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D410 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D412 22 77 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D415                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D415 2A 7D C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D418 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D41A CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D41C 22 7D C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D41F 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D420                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D420 FE 00       >                        cp	0
  16++D422 C2 00 D4    >                        jp	nz,LL90Loop
  17++D425 C9                   ret
  18++D426
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 797+ D426              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 798+ D426
 799+ D426              ; Backface cull
 800+ D426              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 801+ D426              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 802+ D426              ;
 803+ D426
 804+ D426                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D426 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D427 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D428 E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D42A 32 84 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D42D 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D42E CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D430 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D431 E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D433 32 86 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D436 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D437 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D439 E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D43B 32 88 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D43E 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D43F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D440 32 83 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D443 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D444 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D445 32 85 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D448 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D449 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D44A 32 87 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D44D C9                                   ret
  24++D44E
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
 805+ D44E                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D44E 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D44F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D450 E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D452 32 8A C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D455 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D456 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D458 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D459 E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D45B 32 8C C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D45E 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D45F CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D461 E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D463 32 8E C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D466 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D467 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D468 32 89 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D46B 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D46C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D46D 32 8B C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D470 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D471 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D472 32 8D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++D475 C9                                   ret

 806+ D476              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 807+ D476              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 808+ D476              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 809+ D476              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 810+ D476              ; return if no faces
 811+ D476              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 812+ D476              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 813+ D476              ; While Z hi <> 0
 814+ D476              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 815+ D476              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 816+ D476              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 817+ D476              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 818+ D476              ; Loop
 819+ D476              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 820+ D476              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 821+ D476              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 822+ D476              ; For each face
 823+ D476              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 824+ D476              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 825+ D476              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 826+ D476              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 827+ D476              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 828+ D476              ;        else
 829+ D476              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 830+ D476              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 831+ D476              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 832+ D476              ;           While X >= 0
 833+ D476              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 834+ D476              ;              if  x >= 0
 835+ D476              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 836+ D476              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 837+ D476              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 838+ D476              ;           loop
 839+ D476              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 840+ D476              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 841+ D476              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 842+ D476              ;               X = 1
 843+ D476              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 844+ D476              ;           else
 845+ D476              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 846+ D476              ;           endif
 847+ D476              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 848+ D476              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 849+ D476              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 850+ D476              ;               X = 1
 851+ D476              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 852+ D476              ;           else
 853+ D476              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 854+ D476              ;           endif
 855+ D476              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 856+ D476              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 857+ D476              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 858+ D476              ;               X = 1
 859+ D476              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 860+ D476              ;           else
 861+ D476              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 862+ D476              ;           endif
 863+ D476              ;        endif
 864+ D476              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 865+ D476              ;        if dot product < 0
 866+ D476              ;           set face visible
 867+ D476              ;        else
 868+ D476              ;           set face invisible
 869+ D476              ;        end if
 870+ D476              ;     else
 871+ D476              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 872+ D476              ;     end if
 873+ D476              ; Next Face
 874+ D476
 875+ D476 DD 25        ScaleDownXX15byIXH:     dec     ixh
 876+ D478 F8                                   ret     m
 877+ D479 21 83 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaled
 878+ D47C CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 879+ D47E 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 x sign now
 880+ D47F 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y Lo now
 881+ D480 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 882+ D482 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y sign now
 883+ D483 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 z Lo now
 884+ D484 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
 885+ D486 C3 76 D4                             jp      ScaleDownXX15byIXH
 886+ D489 C9                                   ret
 887+ D48A
 888+ D48A 21 77 C0     DivideXX18By2:          ld      hl,UBnkDrawCam0xLo
 889+ D48D CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 890+ D48F 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 x sign now
 891+ D490 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y Lo now
 892+ D491 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 893+ D493 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y sign now
 894+ D494 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 z Lo now
 895+ D495 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
 896+ D497 C9                                   ret
 897+ D498
 898+ D498              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
 899+ D498
 900+ D498              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
 901+ D498              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
 902+ D498              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
 903+ D498              ;
 904+ D498              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 905+ D498              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
 906+ D498              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
 907+ D498              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
 908+ D498              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
 909+ D498
 910+ D498              RotateXX15ByTransMatXX16:
 911+ D498 21 3E C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 912+ D49B CD 7D 91                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 913+ D49E 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 914+ D49F 7D                                   ld      a,l
 915+ D4A0 B0                                   or      b
 916+ D4A1 32 8A C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 917+ D4A4 7D                                   ld      a,l
 918+ D4A5 32 89 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 919+ D4A8
 920+ D4A8 21 44 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 921+ D4AB CD 7D 91                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 922+ D4AE 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 923+ D4AF 7D                                   ld      a,l
 924+ D4B0 B0                                   or      b
 925+ D4B1 32 8C C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 926+ D4B4 7D                                   ld      a,l
 927+ D4B5 32 8B C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 928+ D4B8
 929+ D4B8 21 4A C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 930+ D4BB CD 7D 91                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 931+ D4BE 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 932+ D4BF 7D                                   ld      a,l
 933+ D4C0 B0                                   or      b
 934+ D4C1 32 8E C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 935+ D4C4 7D                                   ld      a,l
 936+ D4C5 32 8D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 937+ D4C8 C9                                   ret

   1++D4C9 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   2++D4CA              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   3++D4CA              ; EE29:
   4++D4CA
   5++D4CA              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   6++D4CA              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
   7++D4CA              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
   8++D4CA              ;       Where [x y z] =
   9++D4CA              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  10++D4CA              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  11++D4CA              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  12++D4CA              ;
  13++D4CA              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  14++D4CA              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  15++D4CA              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  16++D4CA              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  17++D4CA              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  18++D4CA              ;
  19++D4CA              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  20++D4CA              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  21++D4CA              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  22++D4CA              ;
  23++D4CA              ; so
  24++D4CA              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  25++D4CA              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  26++D4CA              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  27++D4CA              ;
  28++D4CA              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  29++D4CA              ;
  30++D4CA              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  31++D4CA              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  32++D4CA              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  33++D4CA              ;
  34++D4CA
  35++D4CA
  36++D4CA
  37++D4CA 3A 7E C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  38++D4CD                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  38++D4CD A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  38++D4CE CA FB D4    >                        jp	z, .ScaleDone
  39++D4D1 2A 77 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  40++D4D4 ED 5B 7A C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  41++D4D8 ED 4B 7D C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  42++D4DC FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  43++D4DE                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  43++D4DE CB 3C       >			   srl h
  43++D4E0 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  44++D4E2                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  44++D4E2 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  44++D4E4 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  45++D4E6                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  45++D4E6 CB 38       >			   srl b
  45++D4E8 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  46++D4EA 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  47++D4EB                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  47++D4EB FE 00       >                        cp	0
  47++D4ED C2 DC D4    >                        jp	nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  48++D4F0 22 77 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  49++D4F3 ED 53 7A C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  50++D4F7 ED 43 7D C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  51++D4FB FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  52++D4FD 32 59 9A                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  53++D500 C9                                   ret
