 212++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
 213++D501              ;;;;;; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 214++D501              ;;;;;.ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
 215++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
 216++D501              ;;;;;    call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
 217++D501              ;;;;;    call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
 218++D501              ;;;;;;    call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
 219++D501              ;;;;;    call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
 220++D501              ;;;;;
 221++D501              ;;;;;
 222++D501              ;;;;;
 223++D501              ;;;;;                        call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; copy DrawCam to Xx15
 224++D501              ;;;;;                        call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation   ; Xx12 = XX15 (face normal) dot rotation matrix
 225++D501              ;;;;;                        call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18              ; now XX18 = dot product
 226++D501              ;;;;;.ProcessNormals:        ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 227++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (varV),hl
 228++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 229++D501              ;;;;;                        srl     a                                                       ;
 230++D501              ;;;;;                        srl     a                                                       ;
 231++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      b,a                                                     ;
 232++D501              ;;;;;                        xor     a
 233++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                                   ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 234++D501              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 235++D501              ;;;;;                        push    bc
 236++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)                                                  ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 237++D501              ;;;;;                        and     $1F                                                     ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 238++D501              ;;;;;                        ;JumpIfAGTENusng c,FaceVisible                                   ; commented out for debuggging the skip
 239++D501              ;;;;;.CheckFaceVisibility:   call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; Get Face data into XX12
 240++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(varXX17)                  ; if scale factor < 4 then skip next bit
 241++D501              ;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng 4,.LL92
 242++D501              ;;;;;.LargeScaleFactor:      call    CopyXX18toXX15
 243++D501              ;;;;;                        jp      .LL89
 244++D501              ;;;;;.Ovflw:                 ld      a,(XX18)
 245++D501              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 246++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18),a
 247++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+6)
 248++D501              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 249++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18+6),a
 250++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+3)
 251++D501              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 252++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18+3),a
 253++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,1                        ; set scale to 1 so when we fall through into LL92, we divide the normal vector by 2 as well
 254++D501              ;;;;;.LL92:                  ld      b,a
 255++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12,   UBnkXScaled
 256++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12+2, UBnkYScaled
 257++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12+4, UBnkZScaled
 258++D501              ;;;;;.LL93                   dec     b
 259++D501              ;;;;;                        jp      m, .LL94
 260++D501              ;;;;;.LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled
 261++D501              ;;;;;                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled
 262++D501              ;;;;;                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled
 263++D501              ;;;;;                        dec     b
 264++D501              ;;;;;                        jp      p,.LL93Loop
 265++D501              ;;;;;.LL94:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR
 266++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS
 267++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ
 268++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+8)
 269++D501              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 270++D501              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 271++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 272++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkZScaledSign
 273++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR
 274++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaledSign, varS
 275++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ
 276++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
 277++D501              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 278++D501              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 279++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 280++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkXScaledSign
 281++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varR
 282++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaledSign, varS
 283++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
 284++D501              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 285++D501              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 286++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 287++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign
 288++D501              ;;;;;.LL89:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ
 289++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 290++D501              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 291++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (varT),a
 292++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 293++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 294++D501              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 295++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (varS),a
 296++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ
 297++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 298++D501              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 299++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (varQ),a
 300++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT,varR
 301++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)
 302++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign
 303++D501              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 304++D501              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 305++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (varT),a
 306++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ
 307++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)
 308++D501              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 309++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      (varQ),a
 310++D501              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT, varR
 311++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)
 312++D501              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 313++D501              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 314++D501              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 315++D501              ;;;;;                        test    $80
 316++D501              ;;;;;                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible
 317++D501              ;;;;;.FaceNotVisible:        ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 318++D501              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 319++D501              ;;;;;                        jp      .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 320++D501              ;;;;;.FaceVisible:           ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 321++D501              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAVisible
 322++D501              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld      hl, CurrentNormIdx
 323++D501              ;;;;;                        inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 324++D501              ;;;;;                        pop         bc
 325++D501              ;;;;;                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 326++D501              ;;;;;                        ld          a,4
 327++D501              ;;;;;                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 328++D501              ;;;;;                        ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 329++D501              ;;;;;                        dec         b
 330++D501              ;;;;;                        jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 331++D501              ;;;;;                        ret                                 ; If Y >= XX20 all normals' visibilities set, onto Transpose. return
 332++D501              ;;;;;
 333++D501
 334++D501
 335++D501
 336++D501 3A 14 C0     CheckDistance:          ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
 337++D504 E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
 338++D506 20 3E                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
 339++D508 2A 12 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
 340++D50B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 341++D50C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
 341++D50C FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
 341++D50E D2 46 D5    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
 342++D511 ED 5B 0C C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
 343++D515 CD C8 AE                             call    compare16HLDE
 344++D518 38 2C                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 345++D51A ED 5B 0F C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
 346++D51E CD C8 AE                             call    compare16HLDE
 347++D521 38 23                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
 348++D523              .CalculateXX4:          ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
 348++D523 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 348++D525 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 349++D527                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 349++D527 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 349++D529 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 350++D52B                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
 350++D52B CB 3C       >			   srl h
 350++D52D CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 351++D52F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 352++D530 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
 353++D532              .DrawAsDotCheck:        JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
 353++D532 C2 48 D5    >                        jp	nz,.ShipIsADot
 354++D535                                      ; Check visbility distance
 355++D535              .SetXX4Dist:            ;break
 356++D535 7D                                   ld      a,l
 357++D536 1F                                   rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
 358++D537 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
 359++D539 CB 3F                                srl     a
 360++D53B CB 3F                                srl     a
 361++D53D 32 36 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
 362++D540                                      SetATrue
 362++D540 AF          >                        xor     a
 363++D541 32 9C C0                             ld      (UBnKDrawAsDot),a           ; set draw as dot to 0, i.e. false
 364++D544                                      ClearCarryFlag
 364++D544 B7          >                        or a
 365++D545 C9                                   ret
 366++D546              .ShipNoDraw:            SetCarryFlag                        ; ship is behind so do not draw, so we don't care abour draw as dot
 366++D546 37          >                        scf
 367++D547 C9                                   ret
 368++D548              .ShipIsADot:            SetMemFalse UBnKDrawAsDot           ; use the same logic as process nodes to do 1 point
 368++D548 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 368++D54A 32 9C C0    >                        ld      (UBnKDrawAsDot),a
 369++D54D                                      ClearCarryFlag
 369++D54D B7          >                        or a
 370++D54E C9                                   ret
 371++D54F
 372++D54F
 373++D54F              ; TODO remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done
 374++D54F              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 374++D54F 3A 18 C3    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 374++D552 A7          >                        and a
 374++D553 C8          >                        ret    z
 375++D554                                     ; break
 376++D554 CD 9D CF                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 377++D557 CD 11 93                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 378++D55A CD 53 D2                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 379++D55D                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 380++D55D 3A 1E C3     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 381++D560 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 382++D562              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 383++D562 CD CA D4                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 384++D565 CD 6C D2                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 385++D568 CD 68 92     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 386++D56B CD E4 D1                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 387++D56E 21 01 C9     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 388++D571 22 54 99                             ld      (varV),hl
 389++D574 3A 18 C3                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 390++D577 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 391++D579 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 392++D57B 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 393++D57C AF                                   xor     a
 394++D57D 32 C9 D4                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 395++D580 E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 396++D581 C5                                   push    bc
 397++D582 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 398++D583 E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 399++D585 E5                                   push    hl
 400++D586 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkDrawAllFaces
 401++D589 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 402++D58A E1                                   pop     hl
 403++D58B DA D0 D6                             jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 404++D58E              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 405++D58E CD 4E D4     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 406++D591 3A 59 9A                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 407++D594 47                                   ld      b,a
 408++D595                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 408++D595 FE 04       >                        cp      4
 408++D597 DA D2 D5    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 409++D59A CD 2E D2     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 410++D59D C3 61 D6                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 411++D5A0 3A 77 C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 412++D5A3 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 413++D5A5 32 77 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 414++D5A8 3A 7D C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 415++D5AB CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 416++D5AD 32 7D C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 417++D5B0 3A 7A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 418++D5B3 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 419++D5B5 32 7A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 420++D5B8 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 421++D5BA                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 421++D5BA 3A 83 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 421++D5BD CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 421++D5BF 32 83 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 422++D5C2                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 422++D5C2 3A 85 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 422++D5C5 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 422++D5C7 32 85 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 423++D5CA                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 423++D5CA 3A 87 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 423++D5CD CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 423++D5CF 32 87 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 424++D5D2              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 425++D5D2              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 426++D5D2 CD 09 D2                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 427++D5D5 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 428++D5D6 FA F5 D5                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 429++D5D9              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 429++D5D9 3A 83 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 429++D5DC CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 429++D5DE 32 83 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 430++D5E1                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 430++D5E1 3A 85 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 430++D5E4 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 430++D5E6 32 85 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 431++D5E9                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 431++D5E9 3A 87 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 431++D5EC CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 431++D5EE 32 87 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 432++D5F1 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 433++D5F2 F2 D9 D5                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 434++D5F5              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 435++D5F5              ; Add normal to XX15
 436++D5F5              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 437++D5F5              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 438++D5F5              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 439++D5F5              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 440++D5F5              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 440++D5F5 3A 87 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 440++D5F8 32 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),a
 441++D5FB                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 441++D5FB 3A 8E C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 441++D5FE 32 54 9A    >                        ld       (varS),a
 442++D601                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 442++D601 3A 7D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 442++D604 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 443++D607 3A 7F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 444++D60A CD 2F B2                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 445++D60D DA A0 D5                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 446++D610 32 87 C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 447++D613                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 447++D613 3A 54 9A    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 447++D616 32 88 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 448++D619                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 448++D619 3A 83 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 448++D61C 32 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),a
 449++D61F                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 449++D61F 3A 8A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 449++D622 32 54 9A    >                        ld       (varS),a
 450++D625                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 450++D625 3A 77 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 450++D628 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 451++D62B 3A 79 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 452++D62E CD 2F B2                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 453++D631 DA A0 D5                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 454++D634 32 83 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 455++D637                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 455++D637 3A 54 9A    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 455++D63A 32 84 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 456++D63D                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 456++D63D 3A 85 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 456++D640 32 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),a
 457++D643                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 457++D643 3A 8C C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 457++D646 32 54 9A    >                        ld       (varS),a
 458++D649                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 458++D649 3A 7A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 458++D64C 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 459++D64F 3A 7C C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 460++D652 CD 2F B2                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 461++D655 DA A0 D5                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 462++D658 32 85 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 463++D65B                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 463++D65B 3A 54 9A    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 463++D65E 32 86 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 464++D661              ; calculate dot product LL89
 465++D661              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 465++D661 3A 89 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 465++D664 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 466++D667 3A 83 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 467++D66A CD 9B B1                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 468++D66D 32 6E 9A                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 469++D670 3A 8A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 470++D673 21 84 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 471++D676 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 472++D677 32 54 9A                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 473++D67A                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 473++D67A 3A 8B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 473++D67D 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 474++D680 3A 85 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 475++D683 CD 9B B1                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 476++D686 32 52 9A                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 477++D689                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 477++D689 3A 6E 9A    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 477++D68C 32 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),a
 478++D68F 3A 8C C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 479++D692 21 86 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 480++D695 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 481++D696 CD 2F B2                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 482++D699 32 6E 9A                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 483++D69C                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 483++D69C 3A 8D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 483++D69F 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 484++D6A2 3A 87 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 485++D6A5 CD 9B B1                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 486++D6A8 32 52 9A                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 487++D6AB                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 487++D6AB 3A 6E 9A    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 487++D6AE 32 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),a
 488++D6B1 3A 88 C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 489++D6B4 21 8E C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 490++D6B7 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 491++D6B8 CD 2F B2                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 492++D6BB FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 493++D6BD 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 494++D6BF 3A 54 9A                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 495++D6C2 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 496++D6C5 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 497++D6C7 3A C9 D4     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 498++D6CA CD B1 D0                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 499++D6CD C3 D6 D6                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 500++D6D0 3A C9 D4     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 501++D6D3 CD A8 D0                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 502++D6D6 21 C9 D4     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 503++D6D9 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 504++D6DA C1                                   pop         bc
 505++D6DB E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 506++D6DC 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 507++D6DE ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 508++D6E0 22 54 99                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 509++D6E3 05                                   dec         b
 510++D6E4 C2 80 D5                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 511++D6E7 C9                                   ret
 512++D6E8
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
 940+ D6E8              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 941+ D6E8              ; Process edges
 942+ D6E8              ; .....................................................
 943+ D6E8              TransposeNodeVal:   MACRO arg0?
 944+ D6E8 ~                    ldCopyByte  UBnK\0sgn,Ubnk\1PointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 945+ D6E8 ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 946+ D6E8 ~                    xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 947+ D6E8 ~                    jp          m,NodeNegative\1                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 948+ D6E8 ~            ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 949+ D6E8 ~            NodeXPositive\1
 949+ D6E8 ~
 950+ D6E8 ~                    ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 951+ D6E8 ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 952+ D6E8 ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 953+ D6E8 ~                    ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 954+ D6E8 ~                    add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 955+ D6E8 ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1Point),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 956+ D6E8 ~                    xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 957+ D6E8 ~                    ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 958+ D6E8 ~                    jp          FinishedThisNode\1
 959+ D6E8 ~            ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 960+ D6E8 ~            NodeNegative\1
 960+ D6E8 ~
 961+ D6E8 ~            LL52\1
 961+ D6E8 ~                                                              ;
 962+ D6E8 ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; Coord
 963+ D6E8 ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; XX12
 964+ D6E8 ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 965+ D6E8 ~                    sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
 966+ D6E8 ~                    jp          p,SetAndMop\1                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 967+ D6E8 ~            NodeXNegSignChange\1
 967+ D6E8 ~
 968+ D6E8 ~            ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 969+ D6E8 ~                    call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 970+ D6E8 ~                    ld          a,(Ubnk\1PointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 971+ D6E8 ~                    xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 972+ D6E8 ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1PointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 973+ D6E8 ~            SetAndMop\1
 973+ D6E8 ~
 974+ D6E8 ~                    ld          (UBnK\0lo),hl                       ; XX15+0
 975+ D6E8 ~            FinishedThisNode\1
 976+ D6E8                                  ENDM

1208+ D875 B7          >                        or a
1209+ D876 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1210+ D878 EB                   ex          de,hl
1211+ D879              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1212+ D879 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1213+ D87C FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1214+ D87F FD 23                inc         iy
1215+ D881 FD 23                inc         iy
1216+ D883 C9                   ret
1217+ D884              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1218+ D884              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1219+ D884              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1220+ D884              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1221+ D884              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1222+ D884              CopyNodeToXX15:
1223+ D884                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1223+ D884 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1223+ D885 32 83 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1224+ D888 23                   inc         hl
1225+ D889                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1225+ D889 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1225+ D88A 32 85 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1226+ D88D 23                   inc         hl
1227+ D88E                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1227+ D88E 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1227+ D88F 32 87 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1228+ D892 23                   inc         hl
1229+ D893              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1230+ D893              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1231+ D893 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1232+ D894 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1233+ D895 47                   ld          b,a
1234+ D896 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1235+ D898 32 84 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1236+ D89B 78                   ld          a,b
1237+ D89C E6 40                and         $40
1238+ D89E CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1239+ D8A0 32 86 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1240+ D8A3 78                   ld          a,b
1241+ D8A4 E6 20                and         $20
1242+ D8A6 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1243+ D8A8 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1244+ D8AA 32 88 C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1245+ D8AD 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1246+ D8AE E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1247+ D8B0 32 6E 9A             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1248+ D8B3 C9                   ret
1249+ D8B4
1250+ D8B4              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1251+ D8B4              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1252+ D8B4              ;..............................................................................................................................
1253+ D8B4              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1254+ D8B4              LL48GetScale:
1255+ D8B4 3A 44 99             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1256+ D8B7 5F                   ld          e,a
1257+ D8B8 CD 84 D8             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1258+ D8BB              LL48GetVertices:
1259+ D8BB              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1260+ D8BB                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1260+ D8BB BB          >                        cp      e
1260+ D8BC DA FD D8    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1261+ D8BF              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1262+ D8BF                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1262+ D8BF 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1262+ D8C0 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1262+ D8C1 32 4F 99    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1263+ D8C4 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1264+ D8C5 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1265+ D8C7 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1266+ D8C8                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1266+ D8C8 21 B0 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1266+ D8CB ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1266+ D8CD 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1267+ D8CE E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1268+ D8CF                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1268+ D8CF FE 00       >                        cp	0
1268+ D8D1 C2 03 D9    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1269+ D8D4              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1270+ D8D4 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1271+ D8D5 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1272+ D8D7 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1273+ D8D9                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1273+ D8D9 FE 00       >                        cp	0
1273+ D8DB C2 03 D9    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1274+ D8DE              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1275+ D8DE                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1275+ D8DE 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1275+ D8DF 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1275+ D8E0 32 4F 99    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1276+ D8E3 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1277+ D8E4 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1278+ D8E6 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1279+ D8E7                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1279+ D8E7 21 B0 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1279+ D8EA ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1279+ D8EC 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1280+ D8ED E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1281+ D8EE                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1281+ D8EE FE 00       >                        cp	0
1281+ D8F0 C2 03 D9    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1282+ D8F3              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1283+ D8F3 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1284+ D8F4 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1285+ D8F6 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1286+ D8F8                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1286+ D8F8 FE 00       >                        cp	0
1286+ D8FA C2 03 D9    >                        jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1287+ D8FD              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1288+ D8FD 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1289+ D900 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1290+ D902                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1291+ D902 C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1292+ D903              NodeIsVisible:
1293+ D903              LL49:
1294+ D903 CD A6 D7             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1295+ D906 C9                   ret
1296+ D907
1297+ D907
1298+ D907              ProjectNodeToEye:
1299+ D907 ED 4B 87 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1300+ D90B 79           	ld			a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1301+ D90C 32 52 9A     	ld			(varQ),a		                    ; VarQ = z
1302+ D90F 3A 83 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo which is signed
1303+ D912 CD 10 AD     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC					; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1304+ D915 3A 84 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1305+ D918                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1305+ D918 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1305+ D91A C2 25 D9    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1306+ D91D              EyePositiveXPoint:									; x was positive result
1307+ D91D 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
1308+ D91F 26 00            ld          h,0
1309+ D921 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
1310+ D922 C3 2C D9         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1311+ D925              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1312+ D925 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1313+ D927 26 00            ld          h,0
1314+ D929                  ClearCarryFlag
1314+ D929 B7          >                        or a
1315+ D92A ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1316+ D92C              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1317+ D92C EB               ex          de,hl
1318+ D92D FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1319+ D930 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1320+ D933              EyeProcessYPoint:
1321+ D933 ED 4B 87 C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; Now process Y co-ordinate
1322+ D937 79           	ld			a,c
1323+ D938 32 52 9A     	ld			(varQ),a
1324+ D93B 3A 85 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo
1325+ D93E CD 10 AD     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	                ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1326+ D941 3A 86 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1327+ D944                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1327+ D944 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1327+ D946 C2 51 D9    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1328+ D949              EyePositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
1329+ D949 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1330+ D94B                  ClearCarryFlag
1330+ D94B B7          >                        or a
1331+ D94C ED 42            sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1332+ D94E C3 56 D9         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1333+ D951              EyeNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1334+ D951 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1335+ D953 26 00            ld          h,0
1336+ D955 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1337+ D956              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1338+ D956 EB               ex          de,hl
1339+ D957 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1340+ D95A FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1341+ D95D C9               ret
1342+ D95E
1343+ D95E
1344+ D95E
1345+ D95E              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1346+ D95E              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1347+ D95E              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1348+ D95E              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1349+ D95E              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1350+ D95E              ; which can be simplified as:
1351+ D95E              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1352+ D95E              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1353+ D95E              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1354+ D95E              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1355+ D95E              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1356+ D95E              ;      Roll calculations:
1357+ D95E              ;
1358+ D95E              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1359+ D95E              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1360+ D95E              ;      Pitch calculations:
1361+ D95E              ;
1362+ D95E              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1363+ D95E              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1364+ D95E
1365+ D95E
1366+ D95E              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1367+ D95E                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D95E
   2++D95E              ; Full version
   3++D95E              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D95E              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D95E              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D95E              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D95E
   8++D95E
   9++D95E              ApplyMyRollToNosev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY
   9++D95E             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
   9++D95E 3A 68 99    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
   9++D961 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
   9++D964             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
   9++D964 2A 23 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
   9++D967 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D96A             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
   9++D96A 3A 21 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D96D 32 4F 99    >                        ld       (varP),a
   9++D970 3A 22 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
   9++D973 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
   9++D975 CD DA AA    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
   9++D978 ED 53 23 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
   9++D97C             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
   9++D97C 2A 21 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
   9++D97F 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
   9++D982 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
   9++D985 CD DA AA    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
   9++D988 ED 53 21 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  10++D98C C9                                   ret
  11++D98D              ApplyMyRollToSidev:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY
  11++D98D             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  11++D98D 3A 68 99    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
  11++D990 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  11++D993             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  11++D993 2A 17 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
  11++D996 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++D999             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  11++D999 3A 15 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++D99C 32 4F 99    >                        ld       (varP),a
  11++D99F 3A 16 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  11++D9A2 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  11++D9A4 CD DA AA    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  11++D9A7 ED 53 17 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  11++D9AB             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  11++D9AB 2A 15 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
  11++D9AE 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  11++D9B1 3A 18 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  11++D9B4 CD DA AA    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  11++D9B7 ED 53 15 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  12++D9BB C9                                   ret
  13++D9BC              ApplyMyRollToRoofv:     ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  13++D9BC             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  13++D9BC 3A 68 99    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
  13++D9BF 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  13++D9C2             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  13++D9C2 2A 1D C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
  13++D9C5 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  13++D9C8             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  13++D9C8 3A 1B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  13++D9CB 32 4F 99    >                        ld       (varP),a
  13++D9CE 3A 1C C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  13++D9D1 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  13++D9D3 CD DA AA    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  13++D9D6 ED 53 1D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  13++D9DA             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  13++D9DA 2A 1B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  13++D9DD 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  13++D9E0 3A 1E C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  13++D9E3 CD DA AA    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  13++D9E6 ED 53 1B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  14++D9EA C9                                   ret
  15++D9EB
  16++D9EB              ApplyMyPitchToNosev:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatNosevZ, UBnkrotmatNosevY
  16++D9EB             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  16++D9EB 3A 5A 99    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  16++D9EE 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  16++D9F1             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  16++D9F1 2A 23 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
  16++D9F4 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  16++D9F7             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  16++D9F7 3A 25 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
  16++D9FA 32 4F 99    >                        ld       (varP),a
  16++D9FD 3A 26 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  16++DA00 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;

  16++DA05 ED 53 23 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  16++DA09             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  16++DA09 2A 25 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
  16++DA0C 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  16++DA0F 3A 24 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  16++DA12 CD DA AA    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  16++DA15 ED 53 25 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  17++DA19 C9                                   ret
  18++DA1A              ApplyMyPitchToSidev:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatSidevZ, UBnkrotmatSidevY
