  18++DA1A 3A 5A 99    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  18++DA1D 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  18++DA20             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  18++DA20 2A 17 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
  18++DA23 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  18++DA26             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  18++DA26 3A 19 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
  18++DA29 32 4F 99    >                        ld       (varP),a
  18++DA2C 3A 1A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  18++DA2F EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  18++DA31 CD DA AA    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  18++DA34 ED 53 17 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  18++DA38             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  18++DA38 2A 19 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
  18++DA3B 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  18++DA3E 3A 18 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  18++DA41 CD DA AA    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  18++DA44 ED 53 19 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  19++DA48 C9                                   ret
  20++DA49              ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:    ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  20++DA49             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
  20++DA49 3A 5A 99    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
  20++DA4C 32 52 9A    >                        ld       (varQ),a
  20++DA4F             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
  20++DA4F 2A 1D C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
  20++DA52 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  20++DA55             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
  20++DA55 3A 1F C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  20++DA58 32 4F 99    >                        ld       (varP),a
  20++DA5B 3A 20 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
  20++DA5E EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
  20++DA60 CD DA AA    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
  20++DA63 ED 53 1D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
  20++DA67             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
  20++DA67 2A 1F C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  20++DA6A 22 53 9A    >                        ld       (varR),hl
  20++DA6D 3A 1E C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
  20++DA70 CD DA AA    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
  20++DA73 ED 53 1F C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
  21++DA77 C9                                   ret
  22++DA78
  23++DA78
  24++DA78              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  25++DA78 ~                                    push    bc
  26++DA78 ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  27++DA78 ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  28++DA78 ~                                    ld      b,a
  29++DA78 ~                                    ld      a,c
  30++DA78 ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  31++DA78 ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  32++DA78 ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  33++DA78 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  34++DA78 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  35++DA78 ~                                    add     hl,de
  36++DA78 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  37++DA78 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  38++DA78 ~                                    pop     bc
  39++DA78 ~                                    ret
  40++DA78 ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  41++DA78 ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  42++DA78 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  43++DA78 ~                                    or      a
  44++DA78 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  45++DA78 ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++DA78 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  47++DA78 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++DA78 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  49++DA78 ~                                    pop     bc
  50++DA78 ~                                    ret
  51++DA78 ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  52++DA78 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  53++DA78 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  54++DA78 ~                                    pop     bc
  55++DA78 ~                                    ret
  56++DA78                                      ENDM
  57++DA78
  58++DA78
  59++DA78              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  59++DA78 C5          >                        push    bc
  59++DA79 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  59++DA7A 3A 0E C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  59++DA7D 47          >                        ld      b,a
  59++DA7E 79          >                        ld      a,c
  59++DA7F A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  59++DA80 FA 91 DA    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  59++DA83             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  59++DA83 ED 5B 50 99 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  59++DA87 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++DA8A 19          >                        add     hl,de
  59++DA8B 22 50 99    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  59++DA8E 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  59++DA8F C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DA90 C9          >                        ret
  59++DA91             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  59++DA91 ED 5B 50 99 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  59++DA95 2A 0C C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  59++DA98 B7          >                        or      a
  59++DA99 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  59++DA9B 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  59++DA9D 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  59++DA9E 22 50 99    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  59++DAA1 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  59++DAA3 C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DAA4 C9          >                        ret
  59++DAA5             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  59++DAA5 AF          >                    xor a
  59++DAA6 95          >                    sub l
  59++DAA7 6F          >                    ld l,a
  59++DAA8 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  59++DAA9 94          >                    sub h
  59++DAAA 67          >                    ld h,a
  59++DAAB 22 50 99    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  59++DAAE 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  59++DAAF C1          >                        pop     bc
  59++DAB0 C9          >                        ret
  60++DAB1
  61++DAB1              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  61++DAB1 C5          >                        push    bc
  61++DAB2 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  61++DAB3 3A 11 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  61++DAB6 47          >                        ld      b,a
  61++DAB7 79          >                        ld      a,c
  61++DAB8 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  61++DAB9 FA CA DA    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  61++DABC             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  61++DABC ED 5B 50 99 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  61++DAC0 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++DAC3 19          >                        add     hl,de
  61++DAC4 22 50 99    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  61++DAC7 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  61++DAC8 C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DAC9 C9          >                        ret
  61++DACA             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  61++DACA ED 5B 50 99 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  61++DACE 2A 0F C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  61++DAD1 B7          >                        or      a
  61++DAD2 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  61++DAD4 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  61++DAD6 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  61++DAD7 22 50 99    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  61++DADA EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  61++DADC C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DADD C9          >                        ret
  61++DADE             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  61++DADE AF          >                    xor a
  61++DADF 95          >                    sub l
  61++DAE0 6F          >                    ld l,a
  61++DAE1 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  61++DAE2 94          >                    sub h
  61++DAE3 67          >                    ld h,a
  61++DAE4 22 50 99    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  61++DAE7 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  61++DAE8 C1          >                        pop     bc
  61++DAE9 C9          >                        ret
  62++DAEA
  63++DAEA              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  63++DAEA C5          >                        push    bc
  63++DAEB 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  63++DAEC 3A 14 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  63++DAEF 47          >                        ld      b,a
  63++DAF0 79          >                        ld      a,c
  63++DAF1 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  63++DAF2 FA 03 DB    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  63++DAF5             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  63++DAF5 ED 5B 50 99 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  63++DAF9 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++DAFC 19          >                        add     hl,de
  63++DAFD 22 50 99    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  63++DB00 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  63++DB01 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DB02 C9          >                        ret
  63++DB03             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  63++DB03 ED 5B 50 99 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  63++DB07 2A 12 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  63++DB0A B7          >                        or      a
  63++DB0B ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  63++DB0D 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  63++DB0F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  63++DB10 22 50 99    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  63++DB13 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  63++DB15 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DB16 C9          >                        ret
  63++DB17             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  63++DB17 AF          >                    xor a
  63++DB18 95          >                    sub l
  63++DB19 6F          >                    ld l,a
  63++DB1A 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  63++DB1B 94          >                    sub h
  63++DB1C 67          >                    ld h,a
  63++DB1D 22 50 99    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  63++DB20 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  63++DB21 C1          >                        pop     bc
  63++DB22 C9          >                        ret
  64++DB23
  65++DB23              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  66++DB23 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  67++DB26              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  68++DB26              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  69++DB26              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  70++DB26
  71++DB26              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72++DB26              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  73++DB26 3A 69 99     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  74++DB29 21 5C 99                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  75++DB2C B6                                   or      (hl)
  76++DB2D CA E7 DB                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  77++DB30                                      ;break
  78++DB30              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  79++DB30 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  80++DB31 2A 0C C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  81++DB34 CD 36 AB                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  82++DB37 32 51 99                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  83++DB3A 22 4F 99                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  84++DB3D              ; A = Flip sign
  85++DB3D 3A 6B 99                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  86++DB40 21 0E C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  87++DB43 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  88++DB44              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  89++DB44 CD B1 DA                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  90++DB47              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  91++DB47 32 25 DB                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  92++DB4A 22 23 DB                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  93++DB4D              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  94++DB4D 3A 5C 99                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  95++DB50 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++DB51 CD 36 AB                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  97++DB54 32 51 99                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  98++DB57 22 4F 99                             ld      (varP),hl
  99++DB5A              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
 100++DB5A 3A 25 DB                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
 101++DB5D 5F                                   ld      e,a
 102++DB5E 3A 5D 99                             ld      a,(BET2)
 103++DB61 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
 104++DB62              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
 105++DB62 CD EA DA                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 106++DB65 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 107++DB68 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 108++DB6B              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 109++DB6B 3A 5C 99                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 110++DB6E 5F                                   ld      e,a
 111++DB6F CD 36 AB                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 112++DB72 32 51 99                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 113++DB75 22 4F 99                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 114++DB78              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 115++DB78 3A 25 DB                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 116++DB7B 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 117++DB7E 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 118++DB7F 3A 5D 99                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 119++DB82 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 120++DB83 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 121++DB84 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 122++DB87 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 123++DB88 F2 97 DB                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 124++DB8B 2A 50 99                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 125++DB8E ED 5B 23 DB                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 126++DB92 B7                                   or      a
 127++DB93 19                                   add     hl,de
 128++DB94 C3 B1 DB                             jp      .MV44
 129++DB97 2A 23 DB     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 130++DB9A ED 5B 50 99                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 131++DB9E B7                                   or      a
 132++DB9F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 133++DBA1 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 134++DBA3                                      NegHL
 134++DBA3 AF          >                    xor a
 134++DBA4 95          >                    sub l
 134++DBA5 6F          >                    ld l,a
 134++DBA6 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 134++DBA7 94          >                    sub h
 134++DBA8 67          >                    ld h,a
 135++DBA9 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and suns are sign + 23 bit xpos
 136++DBAC EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 137++DBAE 32 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 138++DBB1              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 139++DBB1 22 0F C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 140++DBB4 3A 69 99                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 141++DBB7 5F                                   ld      e,a
 142++DBB8 2A 0F C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 143++DBBB CD 36 AB                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 144++DBBE 32 51 99                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 145++DBC1 22 4F 99                             ld      (varP),hl
 146++DBC4 3A 6A 99                             ld      a,(ALP2)
 147++DBC7 5F                                   ld      e,a
 148++DBC8 3A 11 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 149++DBCB AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 150++DBCC CD 78 DA                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 151++DBCF 32 0E C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 152++DBD2 22 0C C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 153++DBD5                                      ;break
 154++DBD5                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
 155++DBD5
 156++DBD5 CD 5E D9                             call    ApplyMyRollToNosev
 157++DBD8 CD 8D D9                             call    ApplyMyRollToSidev
 158++DBDB CD BC D9                             call    ApplyMyRollToRoofv
 159++DBDE CD EB D9                             call    ApplyMyPitchToNosev
 160++DBE1 CD 1A DA                             call    ApplyMyPitchToSidev
 161++DBE4 CD 49 DA                             call    ApplyMyPitchToRoofv
 162++DBE7 3A 4E 9A     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 163++DBEA 16 00                                ld      d,0
 164++DBEC 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 165++DBED 2A 12 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 166++DBF0 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 167++DBF3 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 168++DBF4 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 169++DBF6 CD 11 B1                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 170++DBF9 22 12 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 171++DBFC 32 14 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 172++DBFF C9                                   ret
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
1368+ DC00                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++DC00              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DC00              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
   3++DC00 3A 34 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; get roll magnitudeShip Pitch counter
   4++DC03 47                                   ld      b,a
   5++DC04 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6++DC06 4F                                   ld      c,a
   7++DC07 32 3C C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
   8++DC0A 78                                   ld      a,b
   9++DC0B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  10++DC0D 28 3A                                jr      z,.ProcessRoll
  11++DC0F FE 7F        .CheckPitchDamping:     cp      SignMask8Bit
  12++DC11 28 01                                jr      z,.NoPitchDamping
  13++DC13 3D           .ApplyPitchDamping:     dec     a                           ; pitch = pitch-1
  14++DC14 32 3D C0     .NoPitchDamping         ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  15++DC17 47                                   ld      b,a
  16++DC18 B1                                   or      c                           ; bring sign back in
  17++DC19 32 34 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; rotZCounter = updated value
  18++DC1C 21 1B C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  19++DC1F 22 38 99                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  20++DC22 21 21 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  21++DC25 22 3A 99                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  22++DC28 CD 0E CC                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  23++DC2B 21 1D C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  24++DC2E 22 38 99                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  25++DC31 21 23 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  26++DC34 22 3A 99                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  27++DC37 CD 0E CC                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  28++DC3A 21 1F C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  29++DC3D 22 38 99                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  30++DC40 21 25 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  31++DC43 22 3A 99                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  32++DC46 CD 0E CC                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  33++DC49 3A 33 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  34++DC4C 47                                   ld      b,a
  35++DC4D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  36++DC4F 4F                                   ld      c,a
  37++DC50 32 3C C0                             ld      (univRAT2),a                ; get sign of pitch
  38++DC53 78                                   ld      a,b
  39++DC54 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; and magnitude
  40++DC56 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if no work to do then exit
  41++DC57 FE 7F        .CheckRollDamping:      cp      SignMask8Bit
  42++DC59 28 01                                jr      z,.NoRollDamping
  43++DC5B 3D           .ApplyRollDamping:      dec      a                     ; pitch = pitch-1
  44++DC5C 32 3D C0     .NoRollDamping          ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++DC5F 47                                   ld      b,a

   5++DDFD              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   6++DDFD              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
   7++DDFD               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
   8++DDFD 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
   9++DDFE
  10++DDFE              PrepLines:
  11++DDFE              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  12++DDFE
  13++DDFE              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  14++DDFE              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  15++DDFE              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  16++DDFE              ;        or          8
  17++DDFE              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  18++DDFE              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  19++DDFE              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  20++DDFE              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  21++DDFE              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  22++DDFE              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  23++DDFE              ;
  24++DDFE              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  25++DDFE              InitialiseLineRead:
  26++DDFE                      ;break
  27++DDFE                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  27++DDFE AF          >                        xor      a
  27++DDFF 32 00 C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  28++DE02                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayBytes                  ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  28++DE02 AF          >                        xor      a
  28++DE03 32 01 C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a
  29++DE06                      ldWriteZero PLEDGECTR
  29++DE06 AF          >                        xor      a
  29++DE07 32 FD DD    >                        ld       (PLEDGECTR),a
  30++DE0A 3A 15 C3             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  31++DE0D DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  32++DE0F FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  33++DE12 21 0E C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  34++DE15 22 55 9A             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  35++DE18                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  35++DE18 3A 15 C3    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  35++DE1B 32 59 9A    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  36++DE1E 3A 35 C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  37++DE21                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  37++DE21 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  37++DE23 CA 2B DE    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  38++DE26 E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  39++DE28 32 35 C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  40++DE2B              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  41++DE2B              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  42++DE2B              CalculateNewLines:
  43++DE2B              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  44++DE2B              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  45++DE2B 21 51 C4             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  46++DE2E                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  47++DE2E 22 54 99             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  48++DE31 3A 11 C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  49++DE34 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  50++DE35              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  51++DE35              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  52++DE35 2A 54 99             ld          hl,(varV)
  53++DE38 E5                   push        hl
  54++DE39 FD E1                pop         iy
  55++DE3B                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  56++DE3B ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  57++DE3B                      ENDIF
  58++DE3B 3A 44 99             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  59++DE3E 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  60++DE3F              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  61++DE3F FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  62++DE42                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  62++DE42 BA          >                        cp      d
  62++DE43 DA 96 DE    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  63++DE46              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  64++DE46              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  65++DE46              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  66++DE46 FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  67++DE49 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  68++DE4A E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  69++DE4C                      GetFaceAtA
  69++DE4C 21 B0 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  69++DE4F ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  69++DE51 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  70++DE52              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  71++DE52                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  71++DE52 FE 00       >                        cp	0
  71++DE54 C2 68 DE    >                        jp	nz,VisibileEdge
  72++DE57              IsFace2Visibile:
  73++DE57 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  74++DE58 ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  75++DE5A E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  76++DE5C E5                   push        hl
  77++DE5D                      GetFaceAtA
  77++DE5D 21 B0 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  77++DE60 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  77++DE62 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  78++DE63 E1                   pop         hl
  79++DE64                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  79++DE64 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  79++DE65 CA 96 DE    >                        jp	z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  80++DE68              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  81++DE68              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  82++DE68              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  83++DE68 FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  84++DE6B CD D9 DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  85++DE6E FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  86++DE71 CD EB DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
  87++DE74 CD 47 CD             call        ClipLine
  88++DE77 38 1D                jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
  89++DE79              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
  90++DE79 ED 5B 55 9A          ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
  91++DE7D 21 83 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
  92++DE80                      FourLDIInstrunctions
  92++DE80 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DE82 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DE84 ED A0       >                        ldi
  92++DE86 ED A0       >                        ldi
  93++DE88 ED 53 55 9A          ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
  94++DE8C 21 00 C3             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
  95++DE8F 34                   inc         (hl)
  96++DE90 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
  97++DE91                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
  97++DE91 FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
  97++DE93 D2 AC DE    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
  98++DE96              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
  99++DE96              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 100++DE96              LL78:
 101++DE96 2A 54 99             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 102++DE99 3E 04                ld          a,4
 103++DE9B ED 31                add         hl,a
 104++DE9D 22 54 99             ld          (varV),hl
 105++DEA0 21 FD DD             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 106++DEA3 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 107++DEA4 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 108++DEA5                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 108++DEA5 21 59 9A    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 108++DEA8 BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 108++DEA9 C2 35 DE    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 109++DEAC              CompletedLineGeneration:
 110++DEAC              LL81:
 111++DEAC              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 112++DEAC 3A 00 C3             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 113++DEAF CB 27                sla         a
 114++DEB1 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 115++DEB3 32 01 C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 116++DEB6              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 117++DEB6 C9                   ret
 118++DEB7
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm
1545+ DEB7
1546+ DEB7              UnivBankSize  EQU $ - StartOfUniv
1547+ DEB7
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/univ_ship_data.asm
